front.title: •2-1B (Too-Onebee)
front.gametext: Once per turn, one of your non-droid characters lost from same site may go to your Used Pile rather than your Lost Pile. Subtracts 2 from X on you Bacta Tank.
front.lore: Made by Genetech. Unusually independent for a droid. Forced to serve a Moff on Firro, but was liberated by Tiree. Now dedicated to serving the Alliance.

front.title: •2-1B (Too-Onebee) (V)
front.gametext: Once per turn, may place your non-droid character just lost at same or related site in Used Pile instead of Lost Pile. X on Bacta Tank is -2.
front.lore: Made by Genetech. Unusually independent for a droid. Forced to serve a Moff on Firro, but was liberated by Tiree. Now dedicated to serving the Alliance.

front.title: 2X-3KPR (Tooex)
front.gametext: Where present under 'nighttime conditions,' each of your Rebels and aliens at same planet site are power +2, and also have immunity to attrition < 3 if a Hydroponics Station is present.
front.lore: Simple maintenance and diagnostics droid. Activates alarm sensors, security lighting and power fences on remote installations. KPR servant droids built by Lerrimore Droids.

pulledBy: I've Got A Bad Feeling About
combo: 2X-3KPR (Tooex) + Nightfall + Talz + Hydroponics Station

front.title: •8D8
front.gametext: May cancel Torture, Aiiii! Aaa! Aggggggggggggg! or Sonic Bombardment targeting a character at same site. Once during each of your turns, if with any imprisoned captive, may draw destiny: if destiny > 3, randomly select one captive there to be released.
front.lore: Starship maintenance droid. Sold into the service of Jabba. Sympathetic to the droids and aliens it is forced to torture. Hates EV-9D9.

front.title: •A Brave Resistance
front.gametext: If your [Episode VII] location on table, deploy on table. Your Force generation is +1 at Jakku battlegrounds you occupy. During your deploy phase, may place a Resistance character from hand on top of Used Pile to /\ a Resistance character of equal or lesser ability. [Immune to Alter.]
front.lore: Blank.

front.title: •A Close Race
front.gametext: Plays on table. If you just lost a Podrace, your Force loss is limited to half the difference between the winning race total and your highest race total (round up). While you occupy three battlegrounds, Watto's Box is suspended.
front.lore: 'Poodoo!'

front.title: A Few Maneuvers
front.gametext: Add 2 to hyperspeed and maneuver of any starfighter for the remainder of this turn. (Interrupt may even affect the result immediately after a destiny draw targeting the starfighter's maneuver.)
front.lore: '...I know a few maneuvers. We'll lose them.' Boosted shields and fancy flying are necessary to escape Imperial weapon fire until hyperspace jump can be made.

combo: A Few Maneuvers + Kessel Run Increase your starship's hyperspeed to make a long-distance run (from Kessel to Corellia for example).

front.title: •A Gift
front.gametext: If you just moved a droid to Audience Chamber, deploy on the droid. Droid is an Undercover spy. Wherever opponent has an alien, opponent's battle destiny draws are -2 and Force drains are -1. Immediate Effect canceled if droid leaves Tatooine. (Immune to Control.)
front.lore: 'As a token of my good will, I present to you a gift: these two droids. Both are hardworking and will serve you well.'

pulledBy: Don't Do That Again - Defensive Shield
Don't Do That Again (V) - Defensive Shield
We Wish To Board At Once

front.title: •A Good Blaster At Your Side
front.gametext: Deploy on table. Non-lightsaber weapons carried by your non-Jedi characters may not be stolen. During your control phase, opponent loses 1 Force for each battleground site you control with a non-[Permanent Weapon] blaster present. Rebel Artillery is a Lost interrupt. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: 'I've been looking forward to this for a long time.' 'Yes, I'll bet you have.' Han abruptly ended his conversation with Greedo and flipped Wuher a credit to pay for the cleanup.

front.title: •A Good Blaster At Your Side
front.gametext: Deploy on table. Non-lightsaber weapons carried by your non-Jedi characters may not be stolen. During your control phase, opponent loses 1 Force for each battleground site you control with a non-[Permanent Weapon] blaster present. Rebel Artillery is a Lost interrupt. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: 'I've been looking forward to this for a long time.' 'Yes, I'll bet you have.' Han abruptly ended his conversation with Greedo and flipped Wuher a credit to pay for the cleanup.

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once

front.title: •A Grand Army Of The Republic
front.gametext: Deploy on table. Once per turn, if you just deployed a combat vehicle, may draw top card of Reserve Deck. During your deploy phase, may use 1 Force and reveal one [Clone Army] vehicle from hand to take into hand a clone pilot of ability < 3 (or vice versa) from Reserve Deck; reshuffle and deploy both simultaneously. (Immune to Alter).
front.lore: Blank

front.title: •A Jedi's Concentration
front.gametext: USED: If a battle was just initiated where you have a character armed with a lightsaber, characters may not be targeted by lightsabers for remainder of battle.  LOST: If opponent just initiated a duel, opponent must choose to lose 4 Force or cancel the duel."
front.lore: Luke's experience on Dagobah gave him great skill in using the Force. Vader had to keep his focus on Luke at all times, or face the consequences.

combo: A Jedi's Concentration + Obi-Wan With Lightsaber + Padme Naberrie
A Jedi's Concentration + Take Your Father's Place

front.title: •A Jedi's Cunning
front.gametext: Deploy on table.  While Sidious or an [Episode I] hologram on table, opponent may not cancel immunity to attrition of your Jedi and draws no more than two battle destiny at sites where you have a Jedi.  Opponent draws no more than two battle destiny where Luke present. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Luke's sudden reversal of fortune allowed him to turn the tables on Vader.

front.title: •A Jedi's Focus
front.gametext: USED: If you have a character with a lightsaber in battle, all opponent's aliens at same site are power -1 for remainder of turn ( -2 if alien is non-unique).  LOST: If a duel was just initiated, add the destiny number of the top card of your Lost Pile to your total."
front.lore: Vader was surprised at how far the 'young apprentice' had come in his training.

combo: A Jedi's Focus + Qui-Gon Jinn + Qui-Gon Jinn's Lightsaber
A Jedi's Focus + You'll Find I'm Full Of Surprises

front.title: •A Jedi's Patience
front.gametext: USED: If your character armed with a lightsaber is defending a battle, adds 2 to your total power in that battle.  LOST: During a duel, cancel one of your duel destiny draws to cause a re-draw."
front.lore: Early on in his duel with Vader, Luke took his time in trying to sense his opponent's weaknesses.

combo: A Jedi's Patience + Qui-Gon Jinn

front.title: •A Jedi's Patience (V)
front.gametext: USED: If a captive on table, activate 2 Force.  LOST: Once per game, if a Dark Jedi present with a Skywalker (except Shmi), even as a non-frozen captive, they duel. Both players draw 2 destiny; add ability. Higher total wins. For remainder of turn, winner is immune to attrition and the loser may not move.
front.lore: Early on in his duel with Vader, Luke took his time in trying to sense his opponent's weaknesses.

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by Tom Plis - Chicago V-Lite 2006)

front.title: •A Jedi's Plans
front.gametext: Deploy on a site.  Nightfall is canceled.  While you have 8 or fewer cards in hand, non-unique characters (except clones), vehicles, starships, weapons, and devices are immune to Monnok.  Once per turn, may use 2 Force to deploy Jedi Archives or a battleground planet location (except sector) not on table from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: The guidance of experienced Jedi allowed Luke to confront Vader.

front.title: •A Jedi's Resilience
front.gametext: If you just lost a duel opponent initiated (before duel has any result) lose 1 Force to cancel the duel and return Interrupt (if any) used to initiate duel to owner's hand. OR If you just lost a character armed with a lightsaber, take that character into hand.
front.lore: Luke wasn't going to let Vader dispose of him too quickly.

combo: A Jedi's Resilience + Take Your Father's Place
A Jedi's Resilience + any character with a Lightsaber

front.title: A Jedi's Strength
front.gametext: Deploy on an unoccupied Dagobah site. At the beginning of each of your move phases, opponent may relocate this Jedi Test to an adjacent site. Target a mentor on Dagobah and an apprentice who has completed Jedi Test #1. Apprentice may move only by using personal landspeed. Attempt when apprentice is present at the beginning of your control phase. Draw training destiny. If destiny + apprentice's ability > 13, test completed: Place on apprentice. Apprentice is power +1 and may move normally. Total ability of 6 or more is required for opponent to draw battle destiny.

front.title: •A New Secret Base
front.gametext: Deploy on 1st marker. Yavin 4 locations do not count for Imperial Decree. S-foils and your 'insert' cards are canceled. Once during each of your turns, may take up to two sites (or one site and one Effect) with 'Echo' in title or one planet system with two [Light Side Force] icons into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Due to constant Imperial pursuit, Alliance engineers became adept at constructing new facilities quickly.

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once

front.title: •A New Secret Base (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on table. Once per turn, may use 2 Force to deploy a battleground system from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Your non-unique starfighters apply their deployment modifiers at any location. Once per turn, if you just Force drained at a battleground system, may draw top card of Reserve Deck. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Due to constant Imperial pursuit, Alliance engineers became adept at constructing new facilities quickly.

front.title: •A Remote Planet
front.gametext: Deploy on table. At [Episode I] Tatooine battleground sites, your Force drains are +1 and opponent's cards with ability are deploy -1. While Padme at a Tatooine battleground site, opponent's Force drains at related [Episode I] sites are -1. Place Effect in Used Pile if canceled.
front.lore: In unfamiliar and potentially hostile territory, Qui-Gon knew that success would require patience and caution.

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once

front.title: •A Remote Planet (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on The Hyperdrive Generator's Gone: treat '4' on it as '2'. Your Force generation at City Outskirts is +1. May deploy systems regardless of your Objective deployment restrictions. Once per game, may deploy Qui-Gon or Obi-Wan (an/or their matching weapon_ from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: In unfamiliar and potentially hostile territory, Qui-Gon knew that success would require patience and caution.

front.title: •A Step Backward
front.gametext: Place the top race destiny of all Podracers in owner's Used Pile. OR Place 3 cards from hand (random choice) into your Lost Pile to take any one character from your Lost Pile into hand.
front.lore: The clashing of Podracers slowed the pace of the race as Anakin and Sebulba approached the finish line.

pulls: Any one character from Lost Pile into hand
pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once
combo: A Step Backward + Losing Track
A Step Backward + Qui-Gon Jinn

front.title: •A Tragedy Has Occurred
front.gametext: Deploy on table. Once per game, may use 1 Force to stack one Interrupt just played here. To play any new Interrupt of the same name, player must first stack it here and use +1 Force for each Interrupt in stack, even if Interrupt is normally free. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Senator Palpatine was quick to point out the aggressions of the Trade Federation in front of the Galactic Senate.

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once

front.title: •A Tremor In The Force
front.gametext: Once per game, during your deploy phase, 'insert' (face down) into opponent's Reserve Deck; reshuffle. When effect reaches top it is immediately lost, but opponent may not activate any more Force that turn. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: 'Stand By...'

front.gametext: Deploy on table. Whenever you verify opponent's Reserve Deck, may place a card there with 'podracer' in game text out of play or retrieve 1 Force.
front.lore: 'Stand By...'

front.title: •••A Vergence In The Force
front.gametext: If you just lost more than 2 Force to a Force drain, deploy on opponent's location. You lose no more than 1 Force from Force drains here. At any time, you may place Immediate Effect in Used Pile to draw two cards from top of Reserve Deck.
front.lore: 'A vergence, you say?'

front.title: A-wing
front.gametext: Permanent pilot provides ability of 1. Opponent may not 'react' to or from here. Power -1 when opponent has a starfighter present with higher maneuver.
front.lore: Created by General Dodonna and Rebel engineer Walex Blissex. Designed to combat the speed and maneuverability of the TIE interceptor. Jamming suite disrupts enemy communications.

combo: A-wing + General Walex Blissex

front.title: A-wing Cannon
front.gametext: Deploy on your A-Wing. May target a starfighter or squadron for free. Draw destiny. Add your starship's maneuver. Target hit if total destiny > twice target's defense value.
front.lore: Equipped with targeting sensor system. Weapon mounts pivot up to 60 degrees to improve targeting.

pulledBy: Lieutenant s'Too Vees (when at a docking bay)

front.title: ••A280 Sharpshooter Rifle
front.gametext: Use 2 Force to deploy on your scout warrior. May target a character, creature or vehicle at same or adjacent site for free. Draw destiny. Add 2 if warrior is alone and target is at an adjacent site. Target hit if total destiny > defense value.
front.lore: BlasTech sharpshooter rifle accurate to 500 meters. Corporal Janse brought several A280s with him when he left BlasTech.

combo: A280 Sharpshooter Rifle + Lieutenant Greeve
A280 Sharpshooter Rifle + Corporal Janse + Firefight

front.title: ••A280 Sharpshooter Rifle (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on your Rebel scout. During battles at same site, attrition against opponent is +1. May target a character, creature or vehicle at same or adjacent site for free. Draw destiny. Target hit if destiny +2 > defense value. Once during your control phase, may fire using 2 Force.
front.lore: BlasTech sharpshooter rifle accurate to 500 meters. Corporal Janse brought several A280s with him when he left BlasTech.

front.title: •Aayla Secura
front.gametext: Power +1 for each of opponent's characters here. When with two of your aliens (or clones), adds one battle destiny. May not be targeted by weapons unless your other aliens (and clones) present are each 'hit.' Immune to You are Beaten and attrition <5.
front.lore: Female Twi'lek.

front.title: •Aayla Secura
front.gametext: Power +1 for each opponent's characters here. When with two of your aliens (or clones), adds one battle destiny. May not be targeted by weapons unless your other aliens and clones present are each 'hit.' Immune to You are Beaten and attrition <5.
front.lore: Female Twi'lek.

front.title: •Aayla Secura (AI)
front.gametext: Power +1 for each opponent's characters here. When with two of your aliens (or clones), adds one battle destiny. May not be targeted by weapons unless your other aliens and clones present are each 'hit.' Immune to You are Beaten and attrition <5.
front.lore: Female Twi'lek.

front.title: Access Denied
front.gametext: Insert face up in your Reserve Deck. When Effect reaches top it is lost, along with all opponent's 'insert' cards there. Reshuffle. (Immune to Alter.) OR Deploy between two mobile sites. Opponent's characters may pass only if aboard a Lift Tube or opponent uses +1 Force each.
front.lore: The doors on Cloud City use a special computer controlled locking system, making them difficult to bypass without altering the security codes.

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once
combo: Access Denied + Obi-Wan's Apparition + Restricted Deployment + Civil Disorder + Bespin Making movement on Cloud City quite expensive for the Dark Side player.

front.title: Acclamator-Class Assault Ship
front.gametext: May add 4 pilots, 4 passengers, and 4 vehicles. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. Adds 1 to attrition against opponent here for each piloted [Republic] starship present. Concussions Missiles may deploy aboard.

front.gametext: May add 4 pilots, 4 passengers, and 4 vehicles. Adds 1 to attrition against opponent here for each piloted [Republic] starship present here. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. Concussion Missiles may deploy aboard.

front.title: •Admiral Ackbar
front.gametext: Deploys -2 to Home One. Adds 3 to power of any capital starship he pilots. Your capital starships deploy -1 to same system. Once per game, may take one Mon Calamari character or Admiral's Order into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.lore: Mon Calamari leader of Rebel fleet. Master military strategist. Early prisoner of Grand Moff Tarkin. Convinced his people to join the Alliance.

combo: Admiral Ackbar + Rebel Leadership Add one battle destiny or prevent opponent from drawing more than one battle destiny at same system.

front.title: •Admiral Ackbar (V)
front.gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots. It's a Trap! is destiny +2. Adds one battle destiny while piloting a Mon Calamari Star Cruiser. Once per game, may deploy a capital starship to a system (even as a 'react') from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.lore: Mon Calamari leader of Rebel fleet. Master military strategist. Early prisoner of Grand Moff Tarkin. Convinced his people to join the Alliance.

front.title: •Admiral Ackbar (V)
front.gametext: Adds 3 to power of any capital starship he pilots. Deploys free aboard Home One. While piloting a Star Cruiser, adds one battle destiny. Where you have two Rebel capital starships, attrition against opponent is +2.
front.lore: Mon Calamari leader of Rebel fleet. Master military strategist. Early prisoner of Grand Moff Tarkin. Convinced his people to join the Alliance.

combo: Admiral Ackbar + Rebel Leadership Add one battle destiny or prevent opponent from drawing more than one battle destiny at same system.

front.title: •Admiral Raddus
front.gametext: Your capital starships here are power +1. Once per game, may take Rogue One, a Hammerhead corvette, or a non-unique corvette into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.lore: Mon Calamari leader.

front.title: •Admiral U.O. Statura
front.gametext: At same location, Resistance characters and [Resistance] starships are each defense value and forfeit +1. While at an [Episode VII] location with a Resistance leader, adds one battle destiny.
front.lore: Leader.

front.title: Advance Preparation
front.gametext: USED: Place out of play any one of the following from your hand: Attack Run, You're All Clear Kid, Death Star: Trench or Rebel Tech. Retrieve 1 Force.  LOST: Use 3 Force to retrieve Attack Run."
front.lore: Early warning and careful planning allow the Rebels to achieve maximum readiness while still maintaining optimal flexibility.

front.title: Advance Preparation (V)
front.gametext: USED: Cancel Uncertain Is The Future  STARTING: If Massassi Base Operations on table, deploy from Reserve Deck Death Star Schematics, Massassi War Room, and up to two Effects that deploy for free and are [Immune to Alter].  Place this Interrupt in hand.
front.lore: Early warning and careful planning allow the Rebels to achieve maximum readiness while still maintaining optimal flexibility.

front.lore: With only a few Jedi remaining in the galaxy, each confrontation between them has far reaching consequences.

front.title: Agents In The Court / No Love For The Empire
front.gametext: Agents In The Court:Deploy Hutt Trade Route and a Jabba's Palace site. May deploy Yarna d'al' Gargan. Reveal one unique (•) alien from your deck whose lore specifies its species. This card is your Rep.For remainder of game, your Rep is a leader. Yarna d'al' Gargan is immune to Alter. You may not deploy 'insert' cards or operatives. While a rancor is at Rancor Pit, Trap Door is immune to Bo Shuda.{Flip} this card if you occupy two battleground sites (must occupy a third with a non-unique alien of your Rep's species if a non-Tatooine location is on table).No Love For The Empire:{While} this side up, once per turn you may cancel a Force drain or a just-drawn battle destiny by placing here from hand a copy of your Rep. Once during each of your control phases, you may retrieve a non-unique alien of your Rep's species. When two of your aliens are battling at any Tatooine location, add one destiny to total power. For remainder of game, your Rep may deploy from here as if from hand.{Flip} this card if you do not occupy 2 battleground sites.

front.lore: Female Togruta.

front.gametext: Power +1 with Anakin. Permanent weapon is •Ahsoka's Lightsabers (may target a character for free, or target two characters using 1 Force; draw two destiny; target(s) hit and forfeit -2 if total destiny > total defense value).
front.lore: Female Togruta Padawan.

front.title: •Aim High

front.title: Air-2 Racing Swoop
front.gametext: May add 1 driver and 1 passenger. *Landspeed = Driver's ability, and once per turn, may follow an opponent's vehicle or character that just moved from same site (if within range).
front.lore: Features maneuvering flaps and repulsorlift engines. High speed and sensitive controls make swoops hard to drive. Outracing slavers on Bonadan, Han escaped on an Air-2.

front.title: •Alderaan
front.gametext: Light: : Subtract 1 from each of opponent's battle destiny draws here.

front.title: •Alderaan (Blown Away)
front.gametext: Light: : May not be deployed if an Alderaan site (or sector) on table. Star Cruisers ignore location deployment restrictions in their game text.

front.title: Alderaan Consular Ship
front.gametext: May add 3 pilots and 4 passengers. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. Opponent must use +2 Force to initiate a battle here. Once per game, may deploy a senator aboard from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.

front.title: Alderaan Operative
front.gametext: While at an Alderaan site: adds 1 to your Force drains there, is forfeit +1 (and power +1 if your general is on Alderaan) and, once during each of your deploy phases, may deploy one site to Alderaan from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.lore: Many of the Alliance's generals and commanders are from Alderaan. Not all of Alderaan's population are active members of the Rebellion, but most support the cause.

pulledBy: Nar Shaddaa Wind Chimes & Out Of Somewhere

front.title: •All My Urchins
front.gametext: Use 2 Force to deploy at any site where you have presence. Moves like a single character at normal use of the Force. Before initiating a battle where present, a player must first lose 2 Force. Effect lost if you initiate a battle where present.
front.lore: One little, two little, three little Bespinites.

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once
combo: All My Urchins + Order To Engage The Dark Side player can decide between losing three Force for not battling or losing two Force for attacking.
All My Urchins + any sort of battle canceller like It's A Trap!, Blast the Door Kid!, Narrow Escape, or Dodge A good way to make your opponent lose 2 Force for nothing. (l000needles)

All My Urchins + any battle canceller + Order to Engage The opponent is forced to lose Force by battling or not battling. Of course, he'll initiate a battle to lose the least amount of Force and make you play a card from hand to cancel it. Still, if you want to make that combo even more potent, you have a character or weapon or other Interrupt that is a just action that hurts the opponent before you get to cancel a 'just' initiated battle. (Wookie Nookie)

front.title: •All My Urchins & •Cloud City Celebration
front.gametext: Deploy on Table. If Independent Operation on table, and all your ability is provided by Leia, Luke, aliens, Cloud Cars, and [Independent] starship pilots: Cloud City Troopers ignore location deployment restrictions (and 'power -1') in their game text; immunity to attrition of opponent's characters and starships at Bespin locations is limited to < 6; your total battle destiny is +1 (+2 if your trooper in battle); and you retrieve 2 Force whenever you initiate battle. Place on Bottom of Force Pile if canceled.

front.title: •All My Urchins (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on table. Once per turn, if all your ability on table is provided by Cloud Cars, Han (except Han, Chewie, And The Falcon), and aliens, may place your just forfeited card in Used Pile.
front.lore: One little, two little, three little Bespinites.

front.title: •All Wings Report In
front.gametext: Once per game, target on non-unique starfighter on table. Draw destiny. If destiny < X, retrieve X Force, where X = number of copies of that card you have on table. (Immune to Sense.) OR Take one non-unique starfighter into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.lore: 'Red 10 standing by.' 'Red 7 standing by.' 'Red 3 standing by.' 'Red 6 standing by.' 'Red 9 standing by.' 'Red 2 standing by.' 'Red 11 standing by.' 'Red 5 standing by.'

front.title: •All Wings Report In & •Darklighter Spin
front.gametext: USED: Take one unique (•) unpiloted starfighter into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.  LOST: During a battle at a system or sector, if you are about to draw a card for battle destiny, you may instead use the maneuver number of your unique (•) starfighter in that battle."

cards.counterpart: Short Range Fighters & Watch Your Back!

front.title: Alter
front.gametext: Target an Effect, Utinni Effect, or Political Effect (even if just being deployed), and one of your characters on table. Draw destiny. If destiny < ability of character, target Effect is canceled. OR Cancel Sense.
front.lore: The Force can be used to affect the things around a Jedi. 'Always remember, your focus determines your reality.

front.title: Alter
front.gametext: Cancel one Effect (or Utinni Effect) by drawing a destiny < ability of your highest-ability character on table. OR Cancel one Sense card just played.
front.lore: A user of the Force can alter the environment to affect the minds of others. 'The Force can have a strong influence on the weak-minded.'

front.title: Alter & Friendly Fire
front.gametext: USED: Target your highest-ability character and one Effect. Draw destiny. If destiny < ability of target character, cancel target Effect.  LOST: If a battle was just initiated at a site where opponent has at least two characters and one weapon, draw destiny. If destiny is < number of opponent's characters at that site, opponent chooses one to be lost."

front.title: Alter (Coruscant) (V)
front.gametext: USED: Cancel Sense.  LOST: Target an Effect, Political Effect, or Utinni Effect, and one of your characters on table.  Draw destiny.  If destiny < character's ability, target Effect is canceled (you lose no Force to There Is No Try). (Immune to opponent's Objective.)"
front.lore: The Force can be used to affect the things around a Jedi. 'Always remember, your focus determines your reality.

front.title: Alter (Coruscant) (V)
front.gametext: USED: Cancel Sense.  LOST: Target an Effect, Political Effect, or Utinni Effect, and one of your characters on table.  Draw destiny.  If destiny < character's ability, target Effect is canceled (you lose no Force to There Is No Try). (Immune to opponent's Objective.)"
front.lore: A user of the Force can alter the environment to affect the minds of others. 'The Force can have a strong influence on the weak-minded.'

front.title: Alter (Premiere) (V)
front.gametext: USED: Cancel Sense.  LOST: Target an Effect, Political Effect, or Utinni Effect, and one of your characters on table.  Draw destiny.  If destiny < character's ability, target Effect is canceled (you lose no Force to There Is No Try). (Immune to opponent's Objective.)"
front.lore: A user of the Force can alter the environment to affect the minds of others. 'The Force can have a strong influence on the weak-minded.'

front.title: Alter (Premiere) (V)
front.gametext: USED: Cancel Sense.  LOST: Target an Effect, Political Effect, or Utinni Effect, and one of your characters on table.  Draw destiny.  If destiny < character's ability, target Effect is canceled (you lose no Force to There Is No Try). (Immune to opponent's Objective.)"
front.lore: A user of the Force can alter the environment to affect the minds of others. 'The Force can have a strong influence on the weak-minded.'

front.title: Alternatives To Fighting
front.gametext: Use 3 Force to cancel a battle just initiated at a system or sector. OR Cancel Besieged. OR Release (move for free) all your characters from a captured starship to your side of any docking bay site.
front.lore: The Rebellion's limited resources force it to consider the wisdom of any military encounter. In many cases, retreat or deception is a preferable recourse.

cancels: A battle just initiated at a system or sector

front.title: •Ambush
front.gametext: During your turn, target a site where your total power is more than double opponent's total power. Unless opponent has a Dark Jedi or character weapon there, place each opponent character, vehicle and starship there (and cards on them) in owner's Used Pile.
front.lore: 'Well done. Hold them in the security tower, and keep it quiet. Move.'

front.title: •Ambush (V)
front.gametext: Use 1 Force to deploy up to two clones from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. OR If your clones occupy three related battlegrounds during your control phase, use 2 Force (free if on Coruscant) to retrieve any one card into hand. OR If your clone in battle, add one battle destiny.
front.lore: 'Well done. Hold them in the security tower, and keep it quiet. Move.'

front.title: •Ambush (V)
front.gametext: Lose 1 Force to take up to three troopers into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. OR Once per game, target three related battlegrounds occupied by your clones. Your Force drains at same and related battlegrounds this turn are +1.
front.lore: 'Well done. Hold them in the security tower, and keep it quiet. Move.'

front.title: •Amidala's Blaster
front.gametext: Deploy on Amidala. May target a character or creature for free. Draw destiny. Character is power and forfeit = 0 if destiny > defense value. Creature lost if destiny +2 > defense value.
front.lore: Amidala's ability as a warrior is underestimated by those who encounter her. With her weapon of choice, she often uses this fact to her advantage.

front.title: •An Unusual Amount Of Fear
front.gametext: Before any starting cards are revealed, deploy on table with up to 10 cards from outside your deck face-down under here. Cards under here do not count toward your deck limit. Three times per game, may play a Defensive Shield from here, as if from hand.
front.lore: The peacekeepers of the galaxy are not to be taken lightly.

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once

front.title: •An Unusual Amount Of Fear (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on Jedi Council Chamber or Yoda's Hut.  Once per turn, may use 1 Force to take a card with 'A Jedi's' in title (except A Jedi's Resilience) into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.  [Virtual Block 5] Wipe Them Out, All Of Them and opponent's [Sidious] Effects here are canceled. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: The peacekeepers of the galaxy are not to be taken lightly.

front.title: •Anakin Skywalker
front.gametext: If Luke is about to be lost from table and Vader is present, shuffle Reserve Deck and draw destiny. Add 6 if Emperor present. If total destiny > 12, Vader instead crosses to Light Side, Luke is not lost, opponent loses 6 Force, and Emperor (if present) is lost. (Immune to Sense.)
front.lore: 'You were right about me. Tell your sister ... you were right.'

front.title: •Anakin Skywalker, Padawan Learner
front.gametext: Adds 3 to the power of anything he pilots. Deploys -2 aboard Azure Angel. Adds 2 to maneuver of anything he pilots. Players may initiate battles here for free. During battle, your battle destiny draws and Anakin's weapon destiny draws are +1. Immune to attrition < 4.
front.lore: Blank.

front.title: •Anakin Skywalker, Padawan Learner
front.gametext: Adds 3 to the power of anything he pilots. Deploys -2 aboard Azure Angel. Adds 2 to maneuver of anything he pilots. Players may initiate battles here for free. During battle, your battle destiny draws and Anakin's weapon destiny draws are +1. Immune to attrition < 4.
front.lore: Blank.

front.title: •Anakin Skywalker, Padawan Learner (AI)
front.gametext: Adds 3 to the power of anything he pilots. Deploys -2 aboard Azure Angel. Adds 2 to maneuver of anything he pilots. Players may initiate battles here for free. During battle, your battle destiny draws and Anakin's weapon destiny draws are +1. Immune to attrition < 4.
front.lore: Blank.

front.title: •Anakin Solo
front.gametext: Power +2 while armed with a lightsaber. May use any 'stolen' lightsaber. Once during battle, where present, may steal an opponent's just-lost lightsaber. Immune to attrition <3 (<5 while armed with a 'stolen' lightsaber).
front.lore: Padawan.

front.title: •Anakin's Lightsaber
front.gametext: Deploy on your Skywalker of ability > 3. May add 1 to Force drain where present. May target a character or creature for free. Draw two destiny. Target hit, and its forfeit = 0, if total destiny > defense value.
front.lore: Constructed by Anakin Skywalker. Kept by Obi-Wan Kenobi until given to Luke.

front.title: •Anakin's Lightsaber (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on Leia, non-Jedi Luke, or any Mara. May add 1 to Force drain where present. May target a character or creature. Draw two destiny. Target hit, and its forfeit = 0, if total destiny > defense value. Instead of firing, may use 1 Force to cancel a just drawn weapon destiny here.
front.lore: Constructed by Anakin Skywalker. Kept by Obi-Wan Kenobi until given to Luke.

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by Peter Nordstrom - Alderaan Regional 2005)"

front.title: •Anakin's Lightsaber (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on Anakin, Luke, or Rey. May add 1 to Force drain where present. May target a character or creature for free. Draw two destiny. Target hit, and its forfeit = 0, if total destiny > defense value.
front.lore: Constructed by Anakin Skywalker. Kept by Obi-Wan Kenobi until given to Luke.

front.title: •Anakin's Podracer
front.gametext: Deploy on Podrace Arena. Draws 2 race destiny instead of 1. During your draw phase, if opponent has a higher race total than Anakin's Podracer, draw 3 race destiny next turn and choose 2. Once per game may take I Did It! into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.lore: Built from Radon-Ulzer racing engines that Watto regarded as too burned-out to be of any use. New fuel injection subsystem created by Anakin radically increases thrust.

front.title: •Ancient Watering Hole
front.gametext: Deploy on table. Maz and your Rep are immune to attrition. While you have alien characters of five different species on table: your Force drains are +1, your total battle destiny is +1 (+2 if Maz or your Rep in battle), and your aliens are forfeit +1. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Blank.

front.title: •Anger, Fear, Aggression
front.gametext: Insert in opponent's Reserve Deck. When Effect reaches top it is lost, but opponent must initiate a battle by the end of opponent's next battle phase or lose 4 Force. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: 'The dark side of the Force are they. Easily they flow, quick to join you in a fight.'

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once
canceledBy: You Cannot Hide Forever - Defensive Shield
You Cannot Hide Forever (V) - Defensive Shield
Your Insight Serves You Well - Defensive Shield
Your Insight Serves You Well (V) - Defensive Shield

front.title: •Anger, Fear, Aggression (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on table with up to 15 cards from outside your deck face-down under here. Four times per game, may play a Defensive Shield from here (as if from hand). Unless canceling your Interrupt, opponent may not play Uncertain Is The Future until the end of your first turn.
front.lore: 'The dark side of the Force are they. Easily they flow, quick to join you in a fight.'

front.title: •Anger, Fear, Aggression (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on table with any number of Defensive Shields from outside your deck face-down under here. Four times per game, may play a card from here (as if from hand). Unless canceling your Interrupt, opponent may not play Uncertain Is The Future until the end of your first turn.
front.lore: 'The dark side of the Force are they. Easily they flow, quick to join you in a fight.'

front.title: •Anoat
front.gametext: Light: : If opponent initiates a battle here, your starships may move as a 'react' to or from nearest related asteroid sector.

combo: Anoat + Gold 4 + Lieutenant Lepira Lieutenant Lepira adds 1 to Force drain at Anoat.

front.title: •Anoat (V)
front.gametext: Light: : Force loss from Security Precautions is reduced by 4.

combo: Anoat + Gold 4 + Lieutenant Lepira Lieutenant Lepira adds 1 to Force drain at Anoat.

front.title: Anoat Operative
front.gametext: While at an Anoat site: adds 1 to your Force drains there, is forfeit +1 (and power +1 if your smuggler or Ugnaught is on Anoat) and, once during each of your deploy phases, may deploy one site to Anoat from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.lore: Independent H'nemthe merchants at Anoat coordinate the shipping of supplies to Rebel bases throughout the galaxy.

pulledBy: Nar Shaddaa Wind Chimes & Out Of Somewhere

front.title: •Another Pathetic Lifeform
front.gametext: Deploy on table. Once during each of opponent's turns, if you occupy a battleground site, may activate 1 Force. While opponent has a non-unique alien or non-unique starfighter in battle, opponent may not draw more than two battle destiny. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Young Obi-Wan has much to learn about the living Force. Patience with others is also high on that list.

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once

front.title: •Another Pathetic Lifeform
front.gametext: Plays on table. While opponent has a non-unique alien or non-unique starfighter in battle, opponent may not draw more than two battle destiny.
front.lore: Young Obi-Wan has much to learn about the living Force. Patience with others is also high on that list.

cards.counterpart: Wipe Them Out, All Of Them - Defensive Shield

front.title: •Antilles Maneuver
front.gametext: Take one Corellian Slip into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. OR If Luke and Wedge are in a battle together at a system or sector, exclude from that battle one opponent's starfighter or combat vehicle present.
front.lore: As their war with the Empire continued, Rebel pilots learned ways to counter standard Imperial tactics such as the Tallon Roll.

front.title: •Antilles Maneuver & •Rebel Reinforcements
front.gametext: USED: Cancel Lateral Damage (Immune to Sense.) OR During opponent's deploy phase, deploy a Rebel of ability < 3 (except an admiral) aboard your starship from Reserve Deck; reshuffle  LOST: Once per game, if opponent has more cards with ability on table than you, draw destiny and retrieve up to that number of Rebels and/or Rebel starships (may take one retrieved card into hand)."

front.title: •Antilles Maneuver (V)
front.gametext: For remainder of turn, opponent must first use 1 Force to fire a weapon and opponent's starship weapon destiny draws are -1. OR During opponent's deploy phase, deploy a Rebel of ability < 3 (except an admiral) from Reserve Deck aboard your starship; reshuffle.
front.lore: As their war with the Empire continued, Rebel pilots learned ways to counter standard Imperial tactics such as the Tallon Roll.

front.title: •Antilles Maneuver (V)
front.gametext: For remainder of turn, opponent must first use 1 Force to fire a weapon and opponent's starship weapon destiny draws are -1. OR During opponent's deploy phase, deploy a Rebel of ability < 3 (except an admiral) from Reserve Deck aboard your starship; reshuffle.
front.lore: As their war with the Empire continued, Rebel pilots learned ways to counter standard Imperial tactics such as the Tallon Roll.

pulls: A Rebel of ability < 3 (except an admiral) aboard your starship

front.title: •Aquaris
front.gametext: Light: : If you control with a starfighter, opponent's Dreadnaught-class cruisers are deploy +3 and your Force generation here is +3.

front.title: Arc Welder
front.gametext: Deploy on any R-unit droid. During your control phase, may use 2 Force to release an escorted captive present. Also, when present at start of a battle, may cause one opponent's character of ability = 1 present to be excluded from that battle.
front.lore: Used primarily for sealing bulkheads and performing other repair functions. Especially innovative droids use it for other, less conventional purposes.

combo: Arc Welder + any R-unit + Droid Shutdown + Nabrun Leids

front.title: •••Arcona
front.gametext: Power +1 under 'nighttime conditions.' May move away from a battle at same site as a 'react.'
front.lore: Unut Poll is a typical male Arcona. Unlike many other Arcona, he has avoided salt. Scout known to cooperate with Alliance operatives.

pulledBy: Soth Petikkin (when at a Jabba's Palace site you control)
Nar Shaddaa Wind Chimes & Out Of Somewhere
combo: Arcona + Solo Han
Arcona + Blast The Door, Kid!

front.title: •Ardon 'Vapor' Crell
front.gametext: Deploys free on Tatooine. While on Tatooine, your Force drains are +1 at exterior sites where you have a Vaporator or Hydroponics Station (+2 if both). While present with a Vaporator, each of your characters present is immune to attrition < 3.
front.lore: Representative from the Moisture Farmers of Tatooine (local 253). Pays Jabba for protection from Sand People.

combo: Ardon "Vapor" Crell + Owen Lars & Beru Lars + Vaporator + Hydroponics Station

front.title: •Are You Brain Dead?!
front.gametext: USED: Target your [Episode I] Jedi defending a battle. Target is immune to attrition for rest of turn (unless Dark Jedi present).  LOST: In a battle you lost, place a Jedi Council Member you just forfeited in Used Pile to cancel all battle damage and attrition against you."
front.lore: 'I'm not going in there with two Jedi!'

front.title: •Are You Okay?
front.gametext: Subtract 2 from a just drawn destiny targeting the ability or defense value of your non-Jedi [Episode VII] character. OR If you just forfeited a character from a Jakku site during your turn, use 1 Force to deploy that character from Lost Pile to same site for free.
front.lore: Blank.

front.title: •Arleil Schous
front.gametext: When deployed, you may take one non-unique alien into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Your aliens deploy -1 to same or adjacent Tatooine site.
front.lore: One of the Rebellion's main contacts on Tatooine. Widely regarded as a leader in the Mos Eisley alien community. Aging male Defel. Has lost the ability to warp light.

front.title: •Armament Dismantled
front.gametext: Use 4 Force (or 1 Force if Obi-Wan is armed with a lightsaber) to deploy on table if Maul present with Obi-Wan. (Obi-Wan may not move that turn.) Maul's lightsaber may add only 1 to Force drains, and may be 'swung' only once per battle. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Divide and conquer.

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once

front.title: Armed And Dangerous
front.gametext: If a battle or duel was just initiated at a site, deploy (for free) a unique matching weapon on one of your participating characters from hand or Reserve Deck; reshuffle (if from Reserve Deck).
front.lore: The ability to retrieve his weapon by use of the Force was now second nature to Luke.

pulls: One unique weapon matching one of your participating characters if a battle or duel was just initiated at a site

front.title: •Armed And Dangerous & •Krayt Dragon Howl
front.gametext: USED: Cancel Disarmed or Stunning Leader.  OR  If a battle was just initiated, deploy a character weapon on your participating character from Reserve Deck (or hand); reshuffle.  LOST: Use 1 Force to deploy (or retrieve) non-[Reflections III] Obi-Wan from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.  OR  If opponent just initiated a battle against non-[Reflections III] Obi-Wan alone at a site, his forfeit cannot be reduced."

front.title: Artillery Remote
front.gametext: Use 2 Force to deploy on any warrior. Your artillery weapons anywhere on same planet may fire without a warrior present. Also, once each turn during your control phase, one of your artillery weapons on same planet may be fired (at normal use of the Force).
front.lore: Although artillery weapons have a manual firing mechanism, this optional device allows weapons operation from a remote location. Uses coded signals.

front.title: Artillery Remote (V)
front.gametext: Use 2 Force to deploy on your warrior. Your artillery weapons at same and related sites are Heroic and may be targeted by weapons like a vehicle (use armor = 4). May place this device in Used Pile to add 2 to a just drawn artillery weapon destiny.
front.lore: Although artillery weapons have a manual firing mechanism, this optional device allows weapons operation from a remote location. Uses coded signals.

front.title: •Artoo
front.gametext: During each of your control phases, may take one Hero Of A Thousand Devices or A Gift into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. If at a battleground site with C-3PO, may subtract 1 from each opponent's battle destiny at same and related sites.
front.lore: Counterpart to C-3PO. Spy. Obstinate, headstrong and always full of surprises. R2-D2 was an integral part of Luke Skywalker's rescue plans.

combo: Artoo + Hero Of A Thousand Devices + Luke's Backpack
Artoo + Double Agent

front.title: •Artoo & •Threepio
front.gametext: May pilot only Falcon. All droids may be battled. Any player that has no ability in a battle takes no battle damage. Once per turn, may take on card with 'Bad Feeling' in title into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Bad Feeling Have I is suspended.
front.lore: Threepio's extensive experience 'talking' to the Falcon's computer allowed him to pilot the freighter while on Coruscant. Artoo, an R-unit droid, provided moral support.

pulls: One card with 'Bad Feeling' in title
I Have A Bad Feeling About This
I Have A Bad Feeling About This
I Have A Really Bad Feeling About This
I Have A Very Bad Feeling About This
I've Got A Bad Feeling About This
combo: Artoo & Threepio + Chewie With Blaster Rifle Chewie With Blaster Rifle adds one battle destiny if with C-3PO.

front.title: •Artoo & •Threepio (V)
front.gametext: When deployed, may draw top card of Reserve Deck. Unless hit, may re-target a weapon targeting Chewie, Leia, or Luke (of ability < 5) to this droid (targeting may not be canceled). If this droid was just forfeited during opponent's turn, may take it into hand.
front.lore: Threepio's extensive experience 'talking' to the Falcon's computer allowed him to pilot the freighter while on Coruscant. Artoo, an R-unit droid, provided moral support.

front.title: •Artoo (V)
front.gametext: Heroic. Death Star Plans ignores objective game text, but only draws one destiny. Leia may not move (or be carried) the turn she is released. Once per game, may deploy Trash Compactor from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. May not be Undercover, 'choked,' or targeted by Emperor.
front.lore: Counterpart to C-3PO. Spy. Obstinate, headstrong and always full of surprises. R2-D2 was an integral part of Luke Skywalker's rescue plans.

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by Jared Lockwood - Origins V-Lite 2005)"

front.title: •Artoo, Brave Little Droid
front.gametext: While aboard any starfighter, adds 2 to its power and hyperspeed. While in battle at a system, may place Artoo in Used Pile to cancel a just-drawn battle destiny. Cancels Lateral Damage targeting a starship at same system.
front.lore: Starship maintenance droid within the Naboo droid pool. Personally responsible for saving Amidala's starship and getting her to Tatooine.

front.title: •Artoo, Brave Little Droid (AI)
front.gametext: While aboard any starfighter, adds 2 to its power and hyperspeed. While in battle at a system, may place Artoo in Used Pile to cancel a just-drawn battle destiny. Cancels Lateral Damage targeting a starship at same system.
front.lore: Starship maintenance droid within the Naboo droid pool. Personally responsible for saving Amidala's starship and getting her to Tatooine.

front.title: •Artoo, Brave Little Droid (V)
front.gametext: May fly (landspeed = 2). Once per game, may target up to two opponent's droids present; owner must place targets in Used Pile or lose 4 Force. While aboard an [Episode I] starship, it is power +3 and immune to attrition < 4 (or adds 2 to immunity).
front.lore: Starship maintenance droid within the Naboo droid pool. Personally responsible for saving Amidala's starship and getting her to Tatooine.

front.title: •Artoo, Brave Little Droid (V) (AI)
front.gametext: May fly (landspeed = 2). Once per game, may target up to two opponent's droids present; owner must place targets in Used Pile or lose 4 Force. While aboard an [Episode I] starship, it is power +3 and immune to attrition < 4 (or adds 2 to immunity).
front.lore: Starship maintenance droid within the Naboo droid pool. Personally responsible for saving Amidala's starship and getting her to Tatooine.

front.title: •Artoo, Come Back At Once!
front.gametext: USED: Search your Reserve Deck, take one Hero Of A Thousand Devices into hand and reshuffle.  LOST: If R2-D2 is lost, use 1 Force to retrieve him. OR Use 3 Force to search your Reserve Deck, take R2-D2 into hand and reshuffle."
front.lore: 'You haven't finished with me yet!'

front.title: •Artoo, I Have A Bad Feeling About This
front.gametext: If you are about to draw a battle destiny, instead use the destiny number of one of your droids in that battle. OR Add 1 to attrition against opponent for each droid you have in that battle. OR If R2-D2 and C-3PO are in battle together, opponent draws no battle destiny.
front.lore: 'He says our instructions are to give it only to Jabba himself. I'm terrible sorry. I'm afraid he's ever so stubborn about these sort of things.'

front.title: •Artoo-Detoo In Red 5
front.gametext: May add 1 pilot. Permanent astromech aboard is *R2-D2, who adds 2 to power, maneuver and hyperspeed. Luke of ability < 5 deploys free aboard. Immune to attrition < 5 when Luke piloting.
front.lore: R2-D2 saved Luke and his starfighter more times than the young pilot could count.

pulledBy: All Wings Report In & Darklighter Spin

front.title: As Good As Gone
front.gametext: During your move phase, use 2 Force to return one of your smugglers, gamblers or thieves on table (unless captured or missing) to your hand.
front.lore: Han's habit of leaving during a crisis was offset by his tendency to return when his friends needed him the most.

front.title: •Ascension Guns
front.gametext: During your move phase, target any number of your characters at Theed Palace Hallway. Draw destiny. If destiny +2 > number of characters targeted, relocate those characters to one other interior Naboo site. Otherwise targets are lost.
front.lore: Modified S-5 security blasters can be used for a wide array of purposes

front.title: •Ascension Guns (V)
front.gametext: USED: If opponent occupies your site, peek at the top two cards of Reserve Deck and take one into hand.  LOST: During any move phase, lose 2 Force to relocate up to 3 of your characters from an interior Theed Palace site to any related Throne Room (or vice versa).
front.lore: Modified S-5 security blasters can be used for a wide array of purposes

cards.conceptBy: (Original Concept by Pat Johnson - Corellia Regionals 2005)"

front.title: •Ascension Guns (V)
front.gametext: During your deploy phase, use X Force (minimum 1) to relocate X of your characters at an interior Theed Palace site to Theed Palace Throne Room. (Immune to Sense.) OR If opponent occupies your location, peek at top two cards of your Reserve Deck and take one into hand.
front.lore: Modified S-5 security blasters can be used for a wide array of purposes

front.title: •Ascertaining The Truth
front.gametext: Deploy on table. If no senator here, you may place a senator here from hand to subtract 3 from any battle destiny just drawn. If an order agenda here, during your move phase you may peek at top 2 cards of any Reserve Deck; replace in any order.
front.lore: 'We must move quickly to stop the Trade Federation.'

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once

front.title: ASP-707 (Ayesspee)
front.gametext: Your vehicles and devices deploy -1 here. Once during each of your control phases, may place your weapon, device or non-creature vehicle present on top of Reserve Deck. When on Crash Site Memorial, that Effect is immune to Alter.
front.lore: Extremely common menial-labor droid. Used for a variety of tasks. Mostly used for transporting heavy objects from one place to another.

front.title: <><><>Asteroid Field
front.gametext: Light: : 'Asteroid Rules' in effect here. If you control, may cancel Force drain at related system.

front.title: <>Asteroid Sanctuary
front.gametext: Deploy on any asteroid sector you control. During each of your control phases, opponent loses X Force, where X = total number of asteroid sectors at same system that are not occupied by opponent. Effect canceled if opponent controls this location.
front.lore: Smugglers and other criminals sometimes hide in asteroids to avoid capture. The larger the asteroid field, the more resources have to be devoted to the pursuit.

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once
canceledBy: Planetary Subjugation unless present with starship

front.title: •Asteroids Do Not Concern Me
front.gametext: Deploy on any asteroid sector. Target one opponent's capital starship. Pilots aboard target may not use ability to draw battle destiny. Subtract 4 from asteroid destiny when targeting that starship. Utinni Effect canceled when reached by target.
front.lore: The personal fears of Vader's minions do not affect his priorities.

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once

front.title: •Asteroids Do Not Concern Me (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on table. Asteroid Sanctuary is canceled. When you complete Rycar's Run, place it out of play. During your control phase, opponent loses 1 Force for each Asteroid Field you control (limit 3). During your deploy phase, may deploy one Rycar's Run or asteroid sector on table from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: The personal fears of Vader's minions do not affect his priorities.

front.title: Astromech Translator
front.gametext: Deploy on any starfighter. While an astromech character is aboard: If not piloted, starfighter may move and may use power, maneuver and hyperspeed. OR if piloted, starfighter is immune to attrition < 3 (< 6 if matching pilot aboard).
front.lore: Standard technology found on hyperdrive-capable starfighters. Many manufacturers. Converts electronic impulses and high-density electronic languages into readable text.

front.title: •At Peace
front.gametext: Deploy on any apprentice at the beginning of your turn. Apprentice 'rests' (may not attempt Jedi Tests) until end of your next turn, then relocate Immediate Effect to Jedi Test. When attempting this test, that apprentice adds 3 to training destiny. (Immune to Control.)
front.lore: To recover from the strenuous Jedi training routine and revitalize the mind and body, an apprentice must rest to be calm and at peace.

pulledBy: Don't Do That Again - Defensive Shield
Don't Do That Again (V) - Defensive Shield
We Wish To Board At Once

front.title: •At Peace (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on Yoda's Hut.  May use 1 Force to prevent Broken concentration from modifying your training destiny (and Strong Is Vader from retrieving Force) this turn.  If Luke has completed Jedi Test #5 and is about to be hit, may place this Effect out of play to prevent it.
front.lore: To recover from the strenuous Jedi training routine and revitalize the mind and body, an apprentice must rest to be calm and at peace.

front.title: AT-RT
front.gametext: May add 1 pilot (suspends permanent pilot). May move as a 'react.' Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. Dual Laser Cannon may deploy aboard. When deployed, may Dual Laser Cannon aboard from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.

front.title: •••AT-TE
front.gametext: May add 1 pilot and 4 passengers. While piloted by a clone, draws two battle destiny if unable to otherwise. During battle, if about to be lost before the damage segment, it is instead 'hit'. Immune to attrition < 4.
front.lore: Enclosed

front.title: Atgar Laser Cannon
front.gametext: Deploy on an exterior planet site. Your warrior present may target a vehicle at same or adjacent site using 2 Force. Draw destiny. Target crashes if destiny +2 > armor. Target hit if destiny +1 > maneuver.
front.lore: Atgar 1.4 FD P-tower anti-vehicle cannon. Adapted to operate with minimal performance loss in the extremes of a cold environment.

front.title: Attack Pattern Delta
front.gametext: If a battle was just initiated at a site, identify your lead T-47 there. For remainder of this turn, all other T-47s at same site are power +1, are immune to attrition and cannot be targeted by weapons.
front.lore: Snowspeeder attack plan devised by Commander Skywalker and Rebel tactician Beryl Chifonage. Single-file formation protects the squadron as the leader draws fire.

front.title: Attack Pattern Delta (V)
front.gametext: During a battle at a site, if you are about to draw a card for battle destiny, you may instead use the maneuver number of your participating combat vehicle.
front.lore: Snowspeeder attack plan devised by Commander Skywalker and Rebel tactician Beryl Chifonage. Single-file formation protects the squadron as the leader draws fire.

combo: Attack Run + Great Shot, Kid!

front.title: •Attark
front.gametext: When at a site you control, allows your Seekers to deploy free there. Attark also allows your Seekers to move for free and to ignore any or all potential target(s) whenever you choose.
front.lore: From a mysterious species known as Hoovers. Possesses tremendous technical abilities. Small size allows him to easy manipulate detailed electronic equipment.

combo: Attark + Motti Seeker, Tagge Seeker or Tarkin Seeker

front.title: •Attark (V)
front.gametext: During your control phase, if No Love For The Empire on table, may retrieve a non-unique alien of a different species than your Rep.
front.lore: From a mysterious species known as Hoovers. Possesses tremendous technical abilities. Small size allows him to easy manipulate detailed electronic equipment.

front.title: •Aved Luun
front.gametext: Deploys only on Tatooine. During your control phase, may search Reserve Deck, take one Utinni! or Jawa into hand and reshuffle. If you have 3 or more Jawas on table, may play Utinni! to cancel a Force drain at a Tatooine site or to cancel Control.
front.lore: Shaman of her Jawa tribe. Mate of Kalit. Suspects betrayal from her mate's rival, Wittin.

front.title: •Aved Luun (V)
front.gametext: Deploys only on Tatooine. Adds one battle destiny with Kalit. Your Jawas and sandcrawlers are destiny +2. May deploy Jawa Camp, Sergeant Doallyn, or Thedit on table from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.lore: Shaman of her Jawa tribe. Mate of Kalit. Suspects betrayal from her mate's rival, Wittin.

front.title: •Away Put Your Weapon
front.gametext: USED: If a lightsaber was just used to enhance a Force drain, place it in Owner's Used Pile.  LOST: Place any or all of your devices and character weapons on table in your Used Pile."
front.lore: 'I mean you no harm.'

front.title: •Away Put Your Weapon (V)
front.gametext: USED: An opponent's just drawn [Permanent Weapon] weapon destiny is -3. (Immune to Sense.)  LOST: Once per game, retrieve up to 5 weapons (may take one retireved card into hand).
front.lore: 'I mean you no harm.'

front.title: •Azure Angel
front.gametext: May add 1 pilot and 1 astromech. Once per game, may deploy an astromech aboard (for free) from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. While Anakin piloting, your Interrupts targeting this starship may not be canceled and immune to attrition < 5.
front.lore: Blank

front.title: •Azure Angel
front.gametext: May add one pilot and one astromech. During battle, if Anakin or R2-D2 aboard, may lose 1 Force to cancel a non-[Immune to Sense] interrupt. While Anakin or R2-D2 aboard, immune to attrition < 5 (< 6 if both).
front.lore: Blank.

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by Kevin Shannon)"

front.title: •Azure Angel (AI)
front.gametext: May add one pilot and one astromech. During battle, if Anakin or R2-D2 aboard, may lose 1 Force to cancel a non-[Immune to Sense] interrupt. While Anakin or R2-D2 aboard, immune to attrition < 5 (< 6 if both).
front.lore: Blank.

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by Kevin Shannon)"

front.title: B-wing Attack Fighter
front.gametext: Permanent pilot provides ability of 1. May fire 2 or more weapons during battle. Each of its destiny draws is +1. During your turn, may use 1 Force to 'defuse' (lose) an Orbital Mine present.
front.lore: First models designed in Roche asteroid field by Admiral Ackbar's team of Verpine engineers. Early design equipped to detect and neutralize Imperial orbital mines.

front.title: B-wing Attack Squadron
front.gametext: * Replaces 3 B-Wings at one location (B-wings go to Used Pile). Permanent pilots provide total ability of 3. Each of its weapon destiny draws is +1.
front.lore: Utilizes dense formations on attack mission to concentrate firepower. This tactic is particulary effective in defeating deflector shields.

front.title: B-wing Bomber
front.gametext: May add 1 pilot (suspends permanent pilot). Permanent pilot provides ability of 1. May fire two or more weapons during battle. Each of its ion cannon weapon destiny draws is +3.
front.lore: Carries weapon systems capable of taking on escort frigates and capital starships. Armed with high-powered ion cannon used to disable deflector shields.

front.title: •Bacta Infirmary
front.gametext: If Center of Tyranny on Table, deploy on table. Insurrection is lost. Rogue Squadron pilots of ability < 3 are forfeit +1 and if lost from table, may be placed here. During your control phase may use 2 force to take a character here into hand. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Medical wonder invented centuries ago by the Vratix insectoid species. Gelatinous red bacta is suspended in a synthetic solution to create a healing bacterial medium.

front.title: •Bacta Tank
front.gametext: Use 4 Force to deploy on your side of table. A non-droid character you just lost may be placed here instead of Lost Pile. Holds 1 'patient' at a time. During your deploy phase, may use X Force to bring 'patient' to hand, where X = deploy cost of 'patient.'
front.lore: Medical wonder invented centuries ago by the Vratix insectoid species. Gelatinous red bacta is suspended in a synthetic solution to create a healing bacterial medium.

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once
combo: Bacta Tank + FX-7 (Effex-Seven)
canceledBy: Shut Him Up Or Shut Him Down

front.title: •Bail Organa
front.gametext: Agenda: rebellion. Adds one battle destiny with Leia. Your [Coruscant] senators and [Coruscant] Political Effects are lost. While at Senate: unique (•) Rebels of ability < 4 are power +2, and, if opponent just lost Force to a Force drain by a Rebel, may retrieve 1 Force.
front.lore: Leader. Senator.

front.title: •Bail Organa
front.gametext: Agenda: rebellion. While in a senate majority (or Stolen Data Tapes on table), your Force drains at battlegrounds with your Alderaanian of ability < 4 are +1. While aboard a corvette, adds one battle destiny and it may not be targeted by weapons.
front.lore: Alderaanian senator and leader.

front.title: •Bail Organa, Father Of Rebellion
front.gametext: Agenda: rebellion. Your [Coruscant] Political Effects and [Coruscant] senators are lost. Whenever you initiate a battle with a Rebel, may retrieve 1 Force. While in a senate majority, during your control phase, may take one card into hand from Force Pile; reshuffle.
front.lore: Senator. Leader.

front.title: •Balanced Attack
front.gametext: If you have more than one class of 'snub fighter' (Z-95, A-wing, Bwing, X-wing or Y-wing) in a battle, for each different class, add 1 to attrition against opponent (add 2 more if Falcon present). OR Take one admiral or general into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.lore: Alliance starfighter pilots cross-train with other starship types to maximize combat efficiency.

front.title: •Balanced Attack (V)
front.gametext: If your corvette, cruiser, and frigate are in battle together, cancel an opponent's non-[Immune to Sense] Interrupt. OR Deploy a frigate (deploys -2) from Reserve Deck to same system as your corvette and cruiser; reshuffle. OR Deploy a cruiser (deploys -3) from Reserve Deck to same system as your corvette and frigate; reshuffle.
front.lore: Alliance starfighter pilots cross-train with other starship types to maximize combat efficiency.

front.title: •••Baragwin
front.gametext: Once per turn, if the top card of your Lost Pile is a weapon, device or transport vehicle, may use 1 Force to retrieve it. During your control phase, may exchange one card in hand for one weapon or device in your Lost Pile.
front.lore: Hunchbacked scavengers. Found in separate groups throughout the galaxy. Good at finding missing items. Make excellent gun runners. Some work with the rebellion.

pulledBy: Nar Shaddaa Wind Chimes & Out Of Somewhere

front.title: •••Baragwin (V)
front.gametext: This character is lost if a Starting Effect on table. Your non-alien characters at sites are power and forfeit = 0. If present at a battleground site, your Force drains at battleground sites where you have two aliens are +1, and whenever you deploy an alien, retrieve 1 Force.
front.lore: Hunchbacked scavengers. Found in separate groups throughout the galaxy. Good at finding missing items. Make excellent gun runners. Some work with the rebellion.

cards.conceptBy: (Original Concept by Corey Faherty - Nationals 2006)"

front.title: •Bargaining Table
front.gametext: Deploy on your side of table. Once per turn, you may cancel a Force drain by placing here from hand, one non-unique alien. Aliens may deploy from here as if from hand. (If effect canceled by opponent, any aliens here may immediately deploy for free).
front.lore: The alcoves of Jabba's palace are good places to make deals and place bets. Jabba gets a cut of the profits, of course.

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once

front.title: •Bargaining Table (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on table.  Your unique (•) aliens are forfeit +1 (+2 if they have printed deploy costs greater than or equal to their printed forfeit).  During your deploy phase, may deploy one Attark, Crell, Loje, Momaw, Tzizvvt, or Vul from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: The alcoves of Jabba's palace are good places to make deals and place bets. Jabba gets a cut of the profits, of course.

front.title: •Baseless Accusations
front.gametext: During any control phase, target an opponent's senator present with your character with politics at Galactic Senate. For remainder of turn, target's game text is canceled and target is politics = 0.
front.lore: The first step in removing a political opponent is to bring their reputation into question.

front.title: •Battle Plan
front.gametext: Deploy on table. You may initiate battles for free. Also, for either player to initiate a Force drain, that player must first use 3 Force unless that player occupies a battleground site (except a holosite) and a battleground system. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Even though the landing of the stolen shuttle was successful, the Rebel strike team on Endor was forced to rethink their plans when Leia disappeared.

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once
Your Insight Serves You Well & Staging Areas

front.title: •Battle Plan
front.gametext: Plays on table. For either player to initiate a Force drain, that player must first use 3 Force unless that player occupies a battleground site and a battleground system.
front.lore: Even though the landing of the stolen shuttle was successful, the Rebel strike team on Endor was forced to rethink their plans when Leia disappeared.

front.title: •Battle Plan & •Draw Their Fire
front.gametext: Deploy on table. You may initiate battles for free. During a battle you initiate, each time opponent plays an interrupt, opponent must first use 1 Force. For either player to initiate a Force drain, that player must first use 3 Force unless that player occupies a battleground site and a battleground system. (Immune to Alter.)

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once
combo: Battle Plan & Draw Their Fire + Deneb Both

front.title: •Baze Malbus With Cannon
front.gametext: If about to be lost, may fire Baze's Cannon. Permanent weapon is •Baze's Cannon (may target a character for free; draw destiny;  add 1 if targeting a character of ability < 3; target hit, and it's forfeit = 0, if destiny +1 > defense value).

front.title: •BB-8 (Beebee-Ate)
front.gametext: If just forfeited from a site, opponent may capture BB-8. While a captive, adds 1 to Force drains at same site. During your control phase, if at a battleground site and present with a Resistance character, opponent loses 1 Force.
front.lore: Blank.

front.title: •BB-8 In Black Squadron 1
front.gametext: May add 1 pilot. Permanent astromech aboard is •BB-8. If Poe piloting, may lose 1 Force to cancel a just drawn weapon destiny targeting this starship. Immune to attrition < 4.
front.lore: Blank.

front.title: •••Beast Rider
front.gametext: Landspeed = 2.  During battle, for each non-parasite creature here (even if excluded), power +2 (+4 if ferocious).  If an opponent's card here is eaten, you may retrieve up to 4 Force.  Once per turn, may deploy Kaadu here from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.  Cannot be attacked.
front.lore: Female.

front.title: •Beggar
front.gametext: Use 3 Force to deploy on any exterior Tatooine site (free at Beggar's Canyon). You may use any amount of Force in the opponent's Force Pile during your turns. However, if you use more than 1 of the opponent's Force in a turn, Beggar is lost.
front.lore: Many Mos Eisley citizens, once swindled and robbed, become destitute. Unable to afford off-planet passage, they live in the streets and do odd jobs or beg.

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once

front.title: •Begun, The Clone War Has
front.gametext: If Republic At War on table, deploy on table. Foward Command Center gain one [Light Side Icon]. Your force generatation is +1 at each battleground you control with a [Clone Army] card. Your clones gain [Clone Army]. Once per turn may take a [Clone Army] mission into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. (Immune to Alter)
front.lore: Blank

front.title: •Beldon's Eye
front.gametext: Deploy on Bespin: Cloud City. Your Tibanna Gas Miners deploy free to Cloud City sites and double the Force they activate.
front.lore: Symbol for the Cloud City Miner's Guild (not affiliated with the Galactic Miner's Guild). Named after the beldons, giant creatures who generate Tibanna gas.

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once

front.title: •Beldon's Eye & •All My Urchins
front.gametext: Deploy on table. Once per game, if Quiet Mining Colony on table, may search your hand and/or Reserve Deck and reveal an [Independent] starfighter and matching pilot; place both in hand, reshuffle; they each deploy -1 this turn. Once per game, if a battle just initiated at Bespin system with Executor there, may cancel that battle unless opponent uses 15 Force. [Immune to Alter.]

front.title: •Beldon's Eye (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on table. Your [Independent Starship] starships are defense value +2 at Bespin locations. Once per game, if Quiet Mining Colony on table, may simultaneously deploy a unique (•) [Independent Starship] starfighter and matching pilot (for -1 Force each) from your hand and/or Reserve Deck; reshuffle. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Symbol for the Cloud City Miner's Guild (not affiliated with the Galactic Miner's Guild). Named after the beldons, giant creatures who generate Tibanna gas.

front.title: •Beldon's Eye (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on table. Your [Independent Starship] starships are defense value +2 at Bespin locations. Once per game, if Quiet Mining Colony on table, may simultaneously deploy a unique (•) [Independent Starship] starfighter and matching pilot (for -1 Force each) from your hand and/or Reserve Deck; reshuffle. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Symbol for the Cloud City Miner's Guild (not affiliated with the Galactic Miner's Guild). Named after the beldons, giant creatures who generate Tibanna gas.

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once
combo: Quiet Mining Colony / Independent Operation

front.title: •Ben Kenobi
front.gametext: Deploys only on Tatooine. When in a duel, adds 2 to your total. Once per turn, if a battle just ended here, may 'revive' (place here from Lost Pile) your character forfeited from same site this turn. Immune to attrition < 5.
front.lore: Served Bail Organa during the Clone Wars. Saved Anakin's lightsaber until he was able to give it to Luke. Hasn't gone by the name Obi-Wan for a long time.

combo: Ben Kenobi + Encampment or Deploy regardless of location deployment restrictions.
Ben Knobi + Krayt Dragon Howl

front.title: •Beru Lars
front.gametext: Forfeit +2 when at same site as Owen Lars or a Hydroponics Station. If lost from table during opponent's turn, Luke is power +3 until the end of your next turn.
front.lore: Wife of Owen Lars and guardian of Luke Skywalker. Quietly lobbied Owen to allow Luke to attend Academy. Maintains Lars' farm hydroponics labs.

front.title: •Beru Lars (V)
front.gametext: Once per turn, if present at a farm and a destiny was just drawn that is within 1 of the destiny of your 'crop,' may use 1 Force to place 'crop' in Used Pile. Whenever you play Beru Stew or Blue Milk, may draw top card from your Reserve Deck.
front.lore: Wife of Owen Lars and guardian of Luke Skywalker. Quietly lobbied Owen to allow Luke to attend Academy. Maintains Lars' farm hydroponics labs.

front.title: •Beru Stew
front.gametext: Each player must immediately activate 2 Force. Also, you may activate 1 additional Force for each Beru Lars, Owen Lars or Hydroponics Station on table.
front.lore: Moisture farmers grow enough food to sustain Tatooine's population. Beru Lars has devised many dishes using herbs and roots naturally found in Tatooine's desert.

front.title: •Beru Stew (V)
front.gametext: USED: Activate 1 Force (2 if a Lars on table). OR During battle at a farm, add the destiny number of your device on this farm to your total power.  LOST: During battle at a farm, after battle destinies are drawn, place a 'crop' out of play to make attrition against you = 0."
front.lore: Moisture farmers grow enough food to sustain Tatooine's population. Beru Lars has devised many dishes using herbs and roots naturally found in Tatooine's desert.

front.title: •Bespin
front.gametext: Light: : If you control, opponent's characters and vehicles deploy +1 to Cloud City locations

combo: Bespin + Tight Squeeze

front.title: •Bespin: Cloud City
front.gametext: Light: : If you control, for each of your starships or vehicles here, your total power is +1 in battles at Cloud City sites.

combo: Bespin: Cloud City + any lone starship or vehicle + Tight Squeeze
Bespin: Cloud City + Tibanna Gas Miner at related site Adds one to the Force drain here.
Bespin: Cloud City + Tight Squeeze

front.title: •BG-J38
front.gametext: May add 2 to the destiny of each of your holograms and dejariks drawn for battle destiny or weapon destiny. While at a site you control, adds 1 to power of each of your dejariks and holograms at a holosite.
front.lore: Roche J9 worker drone. Undefeated hologame player. Kept by Jabba as a source of entertainment. Hoping for escape or termination.

front.title: •BG-J38 (V)
front.gametext: Your dejariks are destiny +2. Grimtaash is immune to Sense. Once per turn, may take Grimtaash into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.lore: Roche J9 worker drone. Undefeated hologame player. Kept by Jabba as a source of entertainment. Hoping for escape or termination.

front.title: •Big Boomers!
front.gametext: If there is more than 1 card in opponent's Force Pile, opponent must use 1 Force. OR Take a Fambaa or Booma into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. OR If you just drew weapon destiny for your Booma, cancel that destiny to cause a re-draw.
front.lore: Gungan weaponry can be quite sophisticated. Sometimes its users are not.

combo: Big Boomers! + Booma Cancel and re-draw your weapon destiny.

front.title: <>Big One
front.gametext: Light: : 'Asteroid Rules' in effect here. If you control, Force drain +1 here for each Asteroid Field at same system.

front.title: <>Big One: Asteroid Cave Or Space Slug Belly
front.gametext: Light: : 'Cave Rules' in effect here. If you control, may cancel Force drains at system Related to Big One.

cards.counterpart: Big One: Asteroid Cave or Space Slug Belly

front.title: •Biggs Darklighter
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. When piloting Red 3, also adds 1 to maneuver and draws one battle destiny if not able to otherwise.
front.lore: Piloted Red 3 at Battle of Yavin. Childhood friend of Luke. Led mutiny on Rand Ecliptic and theft of Ecliptic from shipyards on Bestine. Ecliptic Evaders emblem on helmet.

front.title: •Biggs Darklighter (V)
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Deploys free to Beggar's Canyon, Red 3, or same location as Fel or Hobbie. While piloting Red 3, it has an [Nav Computer] aboard. During your control phase, may take one Old Times into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.lore: Piloted Red 3 at Battle of Yavin. Childhood friend of Luke. Led mutiny on Rand Ecliptic and theft of Ecliptic from shipyards on Bestine. Ecliptic Evaders emblem on helmet.

front.title: •Biggs, Rogue Legend
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots, 3 on Red 3.  While piloting Red 3, it is maneuver +1 and he draws one battle destiny if not able to otherwise.  If at opponent's system, instead of Force draining here, may take any card into hand from Force Pile; reshuffle.
front.lore: Piloted Red 3 at Battle of Yavin. Childhood friend of Luke. Led mutiny on Rand Ecliptic and theft of Ecliptic from shipyards at Bestine. Ecliptic Evaders emblem on helmet.

front.title: Bionic Hand
front.gametext: Use 2 Force to deploy on a Disarmed character. Cancels the disarming card. Character is power +1 and adds 1 to weapon destiny when firing character weapons. Device lost if character Disarmed again (otherwise, may not be removed).
front.lore: Uses state-of-the-art digital processors. Although Luke had lost his hand, the Alliance could rebuild it. They had the technology. They could make it better, stronger, faster.

front.title: •Black Market Blaster
front.gametext: Deploy on Kyle Katarn or your smuggler. May target a character or creature for free. Draw destiny. Target hit, and may not be used to satisfy attrition, if destiny +2 > defense value. If fired by Kyle Katarn, his immunity to attrition is +1 for remainder of turn.
front.lore: llegal weapon easily purchased by Rebel suppliers on the black market. Rechargeable energy packs make it a cost-effective weapon.

front.title: Blast The Door, Kid!
front.gametext: If a battle was just initiated at an interior site, use 1 Force; for remainder of battle, all characters of ability > 2 and all leaders (on both sides) are simultaneously excluded from that battle.
