front.gametext: May add 2 pilots and 6 passengers. May move as a 'react'. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. Clones on Cloning Cylinders deploy -1 aboard. While a clone aboard, immune to attrition < 4.
front.lore: Enclosed.

front.title: Lucky Shot
front.gametext: Add X to one weapon destiny (before weapon destiny is drawn) when targeting a combat vehicle. USED: X = 1.LOST: X = 3."
front.lore: AT-ATs are nearly impervious to infantry fire, but occasionally a blaster bolt hits between the plating. It's one shot in a million, but such odds are a familiar to the Rebellion.

front.title: •Lucky Shot (V)
front.gametext: If opponent's Effect of any kind was just lost or canceled due to its own game text, place it out of play. OR Until end of turn, Do They Have A Code Clearance? may not modify forfeit. OR Cancel Close Call. OR Cancel Outflank (you may activate 1 Force).
front.lore: AT-ATs are nearly impervious to infantry fire, but occasionally a blaster bolt hits between the plating. It's one shot in a million, but such odds are a familiar to the Rebellion.

front.title: •Luke
front.gametext: Must deploy on Tatooine, but may move elsewhere. May not be deployed if two or more of opponent's unique (•) characters on table. Your warriors at same site as Luke, or adjacent sites are forfeit +1.
front.lore: Raised by guardians Owen and Beru Lars on a moisture farm on Tatooine, where Owen wanted him to stay. Nicknamed 'Wormie' by childhood friends Camie and Fixer.

front.title: •Luke (V)
front.gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots. Adds one battle destiny with Biggs or if piloting a T-16. While piloting a T-16 alone at Beggar's Canyon, opponent must first use 1 Force to draw a card from Force Pile or retrieve a Force. Once per game, may deploy a T-16 here from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.lore: Raised by guardians Owen and Beru Lars on a moisture farm on Tatooine, where Owen wanted him to stay. Nicknamed 'Wormie' by childhood friends Camie and Fixer.

front.title: •Luke Skywalker
front.gametext: While Luke is not on Tatooine your total Force generation is +1. Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots. When piloting Red 5, also adds 2 to maneuver. Immune to attrition < 3.
front.lore: Son of Anakin Skywalker. Student of Obi-Wan Kenobi. Honed piloting skills while bullseyeing womp rats in Beggar's Canyon aboard T-16 skyhopper.

front.title: •Luke Skywalker (V)
front.gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots. If piloting lead starfighter, Attack Run total is +3. During your control phase, if piloting at a battleground, may take Darklighter Spin into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle or retrieve 1 Force.
front.lore: Son of Anakin Skywalker. Student of Obi-Wan Kenobi. Honed piloting skills while bullseyeing womp rats in Beggar's Canyon aboard T-16 skyhopper.

front.title: •Luke Skywalker (V)
front.gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots. If piloting lead starfighter, Attack Run total is +3. During your control phase, if piloting at a battleground, may take Darklighter Spin into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle or retrieve 1 Force.
front.lore: Son of Anakin Skywalker. Student of Obi-Wan Kenobi. Honed piloting skills while bullseyeing womp rats in Beggar's Canyon aboard T-16 skyhopper.

pulls: All Wings Report In & Darklighter Spin

front.title: •Luke Skywalker, Jedi Knight
front.gametext: Deploys -3 to Home One or Endor. Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Power +2 when armed with a lightsaber. Subtracts 3 from any attempt to cross him over (even if captured). Immune to attrition < 5 (< 6 if alone or armed with a lightsaber, < 7 if both).
front.lore: Scout trained in the ways of the Force. Key figure for both the Alliance and the Empire. Desired by Vader as an ally, by Palpatine as a servant and by the Alliance as its savior.

combo: Like My Father Before Me + Luke Skywalker, Jedi Knight

front.title: •Luke Skywalker, Rebel Hero
front.gametext: Adds 3 to the power of anything he pilots. When deployed may deploy from Reserve Deck (or lose 1 force to deploy from lost pile) a blaster on Luke; reshuffle. While armed with a blaster, it may not be stolen and characters hit by Luke may not be used to satisfy attrition. Immune to attrition < 4.
front.lore: Rogue Squadron Pilot.

front.title: •Luke Skywalker, Rebel Scout
front.gametext: May cancel immunity to attrition of any vehicle here. If escorted by Vader and Take Your Father's Place on table, during your move phase may relocate Vader (with Luke) to Death Star II: Throne Room. Immune to Always Thinking With Your Stomach and Attrition < 5.
front.lore: Resourceful scout and member of the Rebel infiltration team assembled to destroy the shield generator. Surrendered to his father so that he would not endanger the mission.

cancels: Immunity to attrition of any vehicle at same site

front.title: •Luke Skywalker, Rebel Scout (V)
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. If drawn for destiny, may take into hand to cancel and redraw that destiny. Power +1 for each Dark Jedi here. Luke's weapon destiny draws are +1. At same site, opponent must first use 1 Force to fire a weapon. Immune to attrition < 6.
front.lore: Resourceful scout and member of the Rebel infiltration team assembled to destroy the shield generator. Surrendered to his father so that he would not endanger the mission.

front.title: •Luke Skywalker, Rebel Scout (V)
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Deploys -2 to a forest. Luke's weapon destiny draws are +1. At same site, opponent must first use 1 Force to fire a weapon. During opponent's draw phase, if alone on Endor, may retrieve 1 Force. Immune to attrition < 5.
front.lore: Resourceful scout and member of the Rebel infiltration team assembled to destroy the shield generator. Surrendered to his father so that he would not endanger the mission.

front.title: •Luke Skywalker, Strong In The Force
front.gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots.  While piloting Red 5 or Rogue 1 (or armed with Luke's Lightsaber), may add one destiny to total power or attrition, and I Have You Now is canceled.  When Luke leaves table, place all your cards on him in Used Pile.  Immune to attrition < 4.
front.lore: Luke's experience on Dagobah gave him great skill in using the Force. Vader had to keep his focus on Luke at all times, or face the consequences.

front.title: •Luke Skywalker, The Last Jedi
front.gametext: Never deploys to a site opponent occupies. Deploys -2 to Ahch-To. Once per turn, may take Force Projection into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. During battle, may cancel an opponent's just drawn destiny to cause a re-draw. Immune to attrition.
front.lore: Blank.

front.title: •Luke Skywalker, The Rebellion's Hope
front.gametext: Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots. If armed with a blaster or rifle at a site (or piloting Red 5), may add one destiny to total power or attrition. Run Luke, Run! is a Used Interrupt. Immune to attrition < 4.
front.lore: Blank.

front.title: •Luke With Lightsaber
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Permanent weapon is •Luke's Lightsaber (may target a character or creature for free; draw two destiny; target hit, and its forfeit = 0, if total destiny > defense value).
front.lore: 'I've taken care of everything.'

combo: Luke With Lightsaber + A Jedi's Resilience

front.title: •Luke, Trust Me
front.gametext: If you have no Epic Events on table (and did not play an Epic Even at the start of the game), deploy on table.  Once per game, may take a [Setup] card into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.  May place this Effect in Used Pile to take an Immediate Effect into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.  May place this Effect in Lost Pile to cancel a Force drain. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Luke's piloting skills and Force abilities made his X-wing a difficult target for Darth Vader as they raced down the Death Star trench.

front.title: Luke's Back
front.gametext: If Luke is lost, use 1 Force to retrieve him from the Lost Pile. OR Use 3 Force to search through your Reserve Deck and take Luke into your hand. Shuffle deck, cut and replace.
front.lore: 'It looks like I'm going nowhere.'

front.title: Luke's Back (V)
front.gametext: Use 1 Force to deploy from Reserve Deck (or retrieve) Luke's Blaster Pistol, Luke's Lightsaber, or non-Jedi Luke; reshuffle. OR Unless Inner Strength on table, use 1 Force to cancel a just drawn weapon destiny targeting Luke (or a just drawn duel or lightsaber combat destiny if Luke is participating).
front.lore: 'It looks like I'm going nowhere.'

front.title: •Luke's Backpack
front.gametext: Deploy on any character. May carry and use any number of devices. May also carry Yoda, Kabe or any one Jawa or Ewok (as if riding a creature vehicle). Adds 1 to training destiny when carrying the Mentor.
front.lore: Made on Dantooine. Luke used the many pockets in his gundark-skin backpack to carry supplies while on patrol.

front.title: •Luke's Bionic Hand
front.gametext: Deploy on Luke. Luke's power and immunity to attrition are +2. During battle at a battleground, may exchange a card in hand with an Interrupt in Lost Pile. This device lost if Luke Disarmed.
front.lore: Uses state-of-the-art digital processors. Although Luke had lost his hand, the Alliance could rebuild it. They had the technology. They could make it better, stronger, faster.

front.title: •Luke's Bionic Hand
front.gametext: Deploy on Luke. Luke's power and immunity to attrition are +2. During battle at a battleground, may exchange a card in hand with an Interrupt in Lost Pile. This device lost if Luke Disarmed.
front.lore: Uses state-of-the-art digital processors. Although Luke had lost his hand, the Alliance could rebuild it. They had the technology. They could make it better, stronger, faster.

pulls: Any Interrupt from Lost Pile (exchange with card from hand)

front.title: •Luke's Blaster Pistol
front.gametext: Use 1 Force to deploy on Luke, 3 on your other warrior. May target a character, creature or vehicle using 2 Force (if targeted by Luke, target loses immunity to attrition for remainder of turn.) Draw destiny. Add 1 if targeting a character or creature. Target hit if total destiny > defense value.
front.lore: Merr-Sonn Model 57. Part of an arms lot purchased for the Alliance from a black market dealer on Ord Mantell. Carried by Luke as a backup for his father's lightsaber.

front.title: •Luke's Blaster Pistol (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on Luke. During battle, opponent may not move from here. Once per battle, may target a character (target loses immunity to attrition for remainder of turn) or vehicle (with maneuver) for free. Draw destiny. Target hit and forfeit -3 if destiny +2 > defense value.
front.lore: Merr-Sonn Model 57. Part of an arms lot purchased for the Alliance from a black market dealer on Ord Mantell. Carried by Luke as a backup for his father's lightsaber.

front.title: •Luke's Blaster Pistol (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on non-Jedi Luke. May target a character for free. Target loses any immunity to attrition for remainder of turn. Draw destiny. Target hit, and its forfeit = 0, if destiny +2 > defense value. If about to be lost, may lose 1 Force to place on bottom of Used Pile.
front.lore: Merr-Sonn Model 57. Part of an arms lot purchased for the Alliance from a black market dealer on Ord Mantell. Carried by Luke as a backup for his father's lightsaber.

front.title: •Luke's Cape
front.gametext: Use 2 Force to deploy on a Rebel or alien. If Luke's Cape is not at a Tatooine location, your total Force generation is +1. That character is immune to attrition < 3.
front.lore: A symbol of the adventurous pilot and the awakening of his destiny. 'You've taken your first step into a larger world.'

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once

front.title: •Luke's Hunting Rifle
front.gametext: Use 1 Force to deploy on Luke or Owen Lars, 3 on your non-droid character. May target a character or creature using 1 Force. Draw destiny. Subtract 1 if targeting a character. Add 2 if targeting a creature. Target hit if total destiny > defense value.
front.lore: Czerka 6-2Aug2. Extended barrel provides long-range targeting without expensive laser sight. Sturdy construction, but no match for a Tusken Raider's gaderffi stick.

front.title: •Luke's Hunting Rifle (V)
front.gametext: Use 1 Force to deploy on Crell, Luke (of ability < 5), or Owen Lars. May target a character or creature using 1 Force. Draw destiny. If destiny + X > defense value, target's power = 0 (lost if a creature), where X = the number of your devices at same and related locations.
front.lore: Czerka 6-2Aug2. Extended barrel provides long-range targeting without expensive laser sight. Sturdy construction, but no match for a Tusken Raider's gaderffi stick.

front.title: •Luke's Hunting Rifle (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on your alien or Rebel. May target a character or creature for free. Draw destiny. Target hit, if destiny +2 > defense value. If hit by Luke or Owen, target's forfeit = 0 and you retrieve 1 Force. Once during your move phase, may fire at a Jawa or Undercover spy.
front.lore: Czerka 6-2Aug2. Extended barrel provides long-range targeting without expensive laser sight. Sturdy construction, but no match for a Tusken Raider's gaderffi stick.

front.title: •Luke's Lightsaber
front.gametext: Deploy on Luke. Adds 1 to defense value and training destiny. May add 1 to Force drain where present. May target a character, creature, speeder bike, or swoop for free. Draw 2 destiny. Target hit, and its forfeit = 0 if total destiny > defense value.
front.lore: Weapon of a truly powerful warrior. Constructed by Luke as part of his training.

front.title: •Luke's T-16 Skyhopper
front.gametext: Requires 1 pilot to use. May carry 1 passenger. May move as a 'react.' may 'bullseye' one Womp Rat per turn. *Landspeed = 4, OR 1 character may shuttle to or from same site for free.
front.lore: Enclosed vehicle used by Luke Skywalker for his early pilot training. Often raced with Biggs Darklighter through Beggar's Canyon.

front.title: •Luke's Ultimatum
front.gametext: Deploy on table. Once per turn, during battle at a Jabba's Palace site, may say 'Free us or die!' to make your destiny draws +1 and your Interrupts immune to Sense for remainder of battle. May place this Effect out of play to cause a player to activate 2 Force.
front.lore: 'Jabba! This is your last chance. Free us or die.'

front.title: •Luke's X-34 Landspeeder
front.gametext: May add 1 driver and 2 passengers. Moves free if Luke aboard. May move as a 'react.'
front.lore: Skywalker's SoroSuub. Common open (AI)r transport. Top speed 250 km per hour. Repulsorlift drive keeps it suspended one meter above ground, even when parked.

front.title: •Lumat
front.gametext: Deploys only on Endor. Power and forfeit +1 for each Light side icon at same Endor site. When on Endor, adds 1 to total weapon destiny whenever you have any Ewok using an Ewok weapon at an Endor site.
front.lore: Ewok archer. Wood carver. Tribal elder that advises Chief Chirpa. Crafts and maintains weapons.

front.title: •Luminous
front.gametext: Deploys and moves like a starfigher. May add 1 pilot and 6 passengers. Has ship-docking capability. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. May use Covert Landing like a shuttle or starfighter (even while landed).
front.lore: Medium transport with boosted hyperdrive. Armor and capacity diminished. Crew trained for reconnaissance and swift intergalatic transport.

combo: Luminous + Covert Landing

front.title: M-HYD 'Binary' Droid
front.gametext: Adds 2 to forfeit of each non-droid character at same and adjacent sites. At any time, any player may use 1 Force to turn M-HYD off (face down) or on again (face up).
front.lore: Pretentious hydroponics droid. Specializes in working with binary load lifters and vaporators. Proficient in a number of languages but prefers to converse only in binary.

front.title: •Mace Windu
front.gametext: Deploys +3 to any location except Jedi Council Chamber. While at Jedi Council Chamber, immune to attrition and once during your control phase, if Amidala at a battleground site and Maul not on table, opponent loses 2 Force.
front.lore: Senior Jedi Council member who maintains rigorous adherence to the Code. Sent Qui-Gon to Naboo to accompany the Queen and learn more about the mysterious 'dark warrior'.

combo: Mace Windu + Smoke Screen + Are You Brain Dead?!

front.title: •Mace Windu (AI)
front.gametext: Deploys +3 to any location except Jedi Council Chamber. While at Jedi Council Chamber, immune to attrition and once during your control phase, if Amidala at a battleground site and Maul not on table, opponent loses 2 Force.
front.lore: Senior Jedi Council member who maintains rigorous adherence to the Code. Sent Qui-Gon to Naboo to accompany the Queen and learn more about the mysterious 'dark warrior'.

front.title: •Mace Windu (V)
front.gametext: Mace's game text may not be canceled (except at Senate) and he may fire one weapon twice per battle. Boba Fett may not add battle destiny draws here. Immune to attrition.
front.lore: Senior Jedi Council member who maintains rigorous adherence to the Code. Sent Qui-Gon to Naboo to accompany the Queen and learn more about the mysterious 'dark warrior'.

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by Zane Thorp - Texas State Winner 2004)

front.title: •Mace Windu (V)
front.gametext: During battle, Mace may 'swing' one lightsaber twice. Fetts may not add battle destiny draws here. Immune to attrition <6 (<8 if with a Dark Jedi).
front.lore: Senior Jedi Council member who maintains rigorous adherence to the Code. Sent Qui-Gon to Naboo to accompany the Queen and learn more about the mysterious 'dark warrior'.

combo: Mace Windu (V) + Are You Brain Dead?!

front.title: •Mace Windu (V) (AI)
front.gametext: Mace's game text may not be canceled (except at Senate) and he may fire one weapon twice per battle. Boba Fett may not add battle destiny draws here. Immune to attrition.
front.lore: Senior Jedi Council member who maintains rigorous adherence to the Code. Sent Qui-Gon to Naboo to accompany the Queen and learn more about the mysterious 'dark warrior'.

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by Zane Thorp - Texas State Winner 2004)

front.title: •Mace Windu (V) (AI)
front.gametext: During battle, Mace may 'swing' one lightsaber twice. Fetts may not add battle destiny draws here. Immune to attrition <6 (<8 if with a Dark Jedi).
front.lore: Senior Jedi Council member who maintains rigorous adherence to the Code. Sent Qui-Gon to Naboo to accompany the Queen and learn more about the mysterious 'dark warrior'.

front.title: •Mace Windu, Jedi Master
front.gametext: Deploys -2 on Naboo. While on Naboo, once during your control phase may use 1 Force to cancel Maul's immunity to attrition for remainder of turn. Immune to attrition < 3 (< 5 while on Naboo).
front.lore: Jedi Council member who is known to be one of the strongest members of the Council. Has come to Naboo to investigate the death of the mysterious 'dark warrior.'

combo: Mace Windu, Jedi Master + Are You Brain Dead?!
cancels: Maul's immunity to attrition for remainder of turn while on Naboo

front.title: •Mace Windu, Jedi Master (AI)
front.gametext: Deploys -2 on Naboo. While on Naboo, once during your control phase may use 1 Force to cancel Maul's immunity to attrition for remainder of turn. Immune to attrition < 3 (< 5 while on Naboo).
front.lore: Jedi Council member who is known to be one of the strongest members of the Council. Has come to Naboo to investigate the death of the mysterious 'dark warrior.'

front.title: •Mace Windu, Master of the Order
front.gametext: * = 1 or number of Jedi on table (to a maximum of 3), whichever is higher. Mace's forfeit may not be reduced and his total weapon destiny is +1. If a Dark Jedi was just lost from table, may retrieve 1 Force. Immune to attrition.
front.lore: Senior Jedi Council member who maintains rigorous adherence to the Code. Sent Qui-Gon to Naboo to accompany the Queen and learn more about the mysterious 'dark warrior'.

front.title: •Mace Windu, Master of the Order (AI)
front.gametext: * = 1 or number of Jedi on table (to a maximum of 3), whichever is higher. Mace's forfeit may not be reduced and his total weapon destiny is +1. If a Dark Jedi was just lost from table, may retrieve 1 Force. Immune to attrition.
front.lore: Senior Jedi Council member who maintains rigorous adherence to the Code. Sent Qui-Gon to Naboo to accompany the Queen and learn more about the mysterious 'dark warrior'.

front.title: •Mace Windu's Lightsaber
front.gametext: Deploy on Mace. May add 1 to Force drain where present. Mace may add 1 to his duel total. May target a character or creature for free. Draw two destiny. Target hit, and its forfeit = 0, if total destiny > defense value.
front.lore: Elegant sword of pure energy. 'This is the weapon of a Jedi Knight. Not as clumsy or as random as a blaster.' A lightsaber can be dangerous to an unskilled user.

front.title: Magnetic Suction Tube
front.gametext: Deploy on your sandcrawler. Once during each of your control phases, may target one character present. Draw destiny. If destiny > character's ability, 'suck up' character (relocate to related interior Sandcrawler site or owner's Used Pile).
front.lore: Retractable tube originally designed to collect mined materials for transport to refining facilities. Jawas now use it to suck up droids (and anything else that's not nailed down).

front.title: •Major Bren Derlin
front.gametext: While on Hoth, opponent may not 'react' to any Echo site, and Derlin may use 1 Force to cancel Breached Defenses. While at Cantina, power +1 and may use 1 Force to cancel Local Trouble.
front.lore: Hero of Nentan. Supervised construction of Echo Base on Hoth. Head of base security. At the Mos Eisley Cantina, everyone knows his name.

cancels: 'Reacts' to any Echo site while on Hoth

front.title: •Major Bren Derlin (V)
front.gametext: Scout. Deploys free to (and power +2 at) Cantina, Endor, or Hoth. Opponent may not 'react' to or from here. Once per game, may retrieve an Explosive Charge into hand.
front.lore: Hero of Nentan. Supervised construction of Echo Base on Hoth. Head of base security. At the Mos Eisley Cantina, everyone knows his name.

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by Matt Thornton)"

front.title: •Major Caluan Ematt
front.gametext: May deploy -2 as a react to an [Episode VII] site. At the end of each turn, you must use 2 Force, lose 2 Force, or return Ematt to your hand.

front.title: •Major Haash'n
front.gametext: Deploys -2 to any Star Cruiser. Adds 2 to the power of any capital starship he pilots. When piloting a Star Cruiser, adds 1 to hyperspeed and armor and cancels Lateral Damage targeting a starship at same system.
front.lore: Mon Calamari master engineer. Joined the Alliance to fulfill his personal goal of piloting star cruisers.

cancels: Lateral Damage when piloting a Star Cruiser

front.title: •Major Haash'n (V)
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Your Force drains and Force drain bonuses may not be canceled at same system.
front.lore: Mon Calamari master engineer. Joined the Alliance to fulfill his personal goal of piloting star cruisers.

front.title: •Major Harter Kalonia
front.gametext: Resistance characters here may not have their forfeit reduced. If you just forfeited a 'hit' non-droid character from same or related site, may lose 1 Force to place that character in Used Pile.
front.lore: Female.

front.title: •Major Olander Brit
front.gametext: Power and forfeit +1 while present with Major Panno. When with Major Panno at a site, adds one battle destiny. When present with a Scomplink, cancels Counter Assault at a related site where you have a spy or scout.
front.lore: Communications expert. Staff monitors entire spectrum of electromagnetic signals. Politically minded. Followed Panno to the Alliance.

cancels: Counter Assault at a related site where you have a spy or scout

front.title: •Major Palo Torshan
front.gametext: Deploys -2 on a Rebel Base. While at your war room, adds 1 to your Attack Run total. Once during each of your control phases, may use 1 Force to take one Double Agent or Sabotage into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.lore: Coordinator of Rebel base security. Served under General Dodonna at Yavin 4. Sat in on conferences planning the Battle of Yavin. Developed counterintelligence techniques.

front.title: •Major Panno
front.gametext: While at a system or an exterior battleground site, allows you to activate up to 2 additional Force for each related exterior battleground site you occupy with a scout (limit 4 additional Force).
front.lore: Male Dresselian scout. Former commando. Tactician. Works with General Madine to plan logistics of strike operations.

combo: Major Panno + Major Olander Brit

front.title: •Major Taslin Brance
front.gametext: If oppnent just looked at cards in their deck or pile, after replacing, you may peek at the top card of that deck or pile. At the start of your control phase, if the top card of your lost pile is a Resistance character or [Restistance] starship, opponent loses 1 Force.

front.title: •Make Ten Men Feel Like A Hundred
front.gametext: If Stardust on table, deploy on table. Saw is a Resistance Agent and spy. Once per game, may deploy Saw from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Rebel spies are deploy -1 to Scarif. Once per battle, if you just drew a Rebel spy for destiny, may retrieve 1 Force. Nightfall is canceled. [Immune to Alter.]
front.lore: Blank.

front.title: •Malastare
front.gametext: Light: : If you have won a Podrace, Force drain +1 here.

front.title: •Mandalorian Mishap
front.gametext: If Boba Fett is defending a battle, draw one battle destiny. Subtract that amount from opponent's attrition and total power (cannot fall below zero). OR Cancel, for the remainder of the turn, the game text of Jet Pack or any weapon that may fire repeatedly.
front.lore: Most space-faring adventurers meet their fate with a calm, quiet dignity.

cancels: Game text of any weapon that may fire repeatedly
Game text of Antipersonnel Laser Cannon
Game text of AT-ST Dual Cannon
Game text of Boba Fett's Blaster Rifle
Game text of Light Repeating Blaster Rifle

front.title: •Mandalorian Mishap & •Jedi Mind Trick
front.gametext: USED: Use 1 Force to suspend [Virtual Block 3] Hutt Bounty or Scum And Villainy for remainder of turn. OR Target a planet site you occupy (even at the beginning of a turn). For remainder of turn, add one [Light Side Force] icon to that site.LOST: If your character of ability > 4 is with opponent's character of lesser ability (except Jabba or Watto), reveal opponent's hand. Select a card there; if opponent does not use or lose 2 Force, it is lost."
front.lore: Blank

front.title: •Mandalorian Mishap (V)
front.gametext: Suspend all Effects with 'gangster' in game text for remainder of turn. OR Target a bounty hunter and/or gangster at a site. For remainder of turn, targets may not fire weapons and their game text is canceled.
front.lore: Most space-faring adventurers meet their fate with a calm, quiet dignity.

front.title: •Mandalorian Mishap (V)
front.gametext: Cancel the game text of Jodo or any Fett for remainder of turn. OR Take Sabine, Under Attack, or a blaster into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. OR During a battle, if opponent just drew more than two battle destiny, cancel one of those destiny draws (your choice).
front.lore: Most space-faring adventurers meet their fate with a calm, quiet dignity.

front.title: Maneuvering Flaps
front.gametext: Deploy on your side of table. Once during each of your control phases, may use 1 Force: your combat vehicles and shuttle vehicles are power and forfeit +2, maneuver +1 and landspeed=0 until start of your next turn. (Immune to Alter if Luke or Zev on table.)
front.lore: Enhanced steering mechanisms on Rebel T-47s provide increased maneuverability in planetary atmospheres.

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once

front.title: •Maneuvering Flaps & •Nick Of Time
front.gametext: Deploy on table. Your vehicles with a pilot character or gunner aboard are not hit when 'thrown.' During your deploy phase, may reveal an unpiloted combat vehicle from hand to take its matching pilot character (or vice versa) from Reserve Deck and deploy both simultaneously; reshuffle. Whenever you play Desperate Tactics, Lucky Shot, On Target, Rapid Fire, or Steady Aim, may draw top card from Reserve Deck. (Immune to Alter.)

front.title: Maneuvering Flaps (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on table. During your deploy phase, may reveal an unpiloted combat vehicle from hand to take its matching pilot character (or vice versa) into hand from Reserve Deck and deploy both simultaneously; reshuffle. May not be suspended (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Enhanced steering mechanisms on Rebel T-47s provide increased maneuverability in planetary atmospheres.

front.title: Maneuvering Flaps (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on table. During your deploy phase, may reveal an unpiloted combat vehicle from hand to take its matching pilot character (or vice versa) into hand from Reserve Deck and deploy both simultaneously; reshuffle. May not be suspended (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Enhanced steering mechanisms on Rebel T-47s provide increased maneuverability in planetary atmospheres.

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once

front.title: •Mantellian Savrip
front.gametext: Use 3 Force to deploy on your side of table (free if C-3PO on table). After losing any battle: characters, starships and vehicles may be forfeited directly from your hand (for forfeit value) to reduce attrition or battle damage.
front.lore: Dejarik game uses holograms of mythological and real creatures from across the galaxy. The hulking Mantellian savrip is a nasty predator from Ord Mantell.

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once
combo: Mantellian Savrip + BG-J38 Adds 2 to the destiny of each of your holograms and dejariks drawn for battle destiny or weapon destiny.

Mantellian Savrip + Brainiac Brainiac's forfeit is equal to the total number of cards in your opponent's hand, so he often may be sacrificed to the Mantellian Savrip to cover all battle damage and attrtion against you.
canceledBy: Suspended by Cold Feet (V) for remainder of turn

front.title: •Maris Brood, Fallen Jedi
front.gametext: Matching weapon is Elegant Lightsaber and, if Sai'torr Kal Fas on table, may lose 2 Force to deploy it on her from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.  While with Galen or a [Sidious] Effect, adds one battle destiny.  Immune to [Permanent Weapon] weapons and attrition < 5.
front.lore: With only a few Jedi remaining in the galaxy, each confrontation between them has far reaching consequences. Female.

front.title: •Maris Brood, Fallen Jedi (AI)
front.gametext: Matching weapon is Elegant Lightsaber and, if Sai'torr Kal Fas on table, may lose 2 Force to deploy it on her from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.  While with Galen or a [Sidious] Effect, adds one battle destiny.  Immune to [Permanent Weapon] weapons and attrition < 5.
front.lore: With only a few Jedi remaining in the galaxy, each confrontation between them has far reaching consequences. Female.

front.title: •Mas Amedda
front.gametext: Agenda: order. If with Valorum, your Force generation at this location is +1. While in a senate majority, once during your control phase, if you occupy a battleground site and a battleground system, opponent loses 2 Force.
front.lore: Chancellor's Chagrian advisor who maintains order in the Senate. Although Senator Palpatine suggested he may be on the Trade Federation's payroll, nothing has been proven yet.

combo: Mas Amedda + Yarua + senate majority + Control of a battleground site and battleground system First, Amedda causes 2 Force loss in direct damage, then Yarua retrieves one Force when you drain at the system.

front.title: •Masanya
front.gametext: Deploys -4 to same system as any non-unique Star Cuiser. May add 3 pilots, 4 passengers and 1 vehicle. Has ship docking capability. Permanent pilot provides ability of 1. Cannot be 'hit' by missiles.
front.lore: Frequently escorts Mon Calamari star crusiers. Personally assigned by Ackbar to main Rebel fleet. Advanced scanners continuosly disrupt target acquistion signals.

front.title: •Masanya (V)
front.gametext: Deploys -2 to same system as any Star Cruiser. May add 3 pilots and 4 passengers. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. Weapon destinies targeting your starships here are -2.
front.lore: Frequently escorts Mon Calamari star crusiers. Personally assigned by Ackbar to main Rebel fleet. Advanced scanners continuosly disrupt target acquistion signals.

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by Jonathan Wilkerson)"

front.title: Massassi Base Operations / One In A Million
front.gametext: Massassi Base Operations:Deploy Yavin 4 system and Yavin 4: Docking Bay.For remainder of game, you may not play Revolution or Force drain at Yavin 4 sites or sectors.{While} this side up, you generate no more than 1 Force from each Yavin 4 site. Once during each of your deploy phases, may deploy one Yavin 4 site from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Each Imperial is deploy +2 to Yavin 4.{Flip} this card if you control three Yavin 4 sites and opponent controls fewer than three Yavin 4 sites.{Place} out of play if Yavin 4 is 'blown away.'One In A Million:{While} this side up, may deploy Death Star system without completing Death Star Plans. Once during each of your deploy phases, may take one Rebel Tech, Death Star system, Attack Run or Proton Torpedoes into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Your total power is +3 in battles at systems. If Death Star is 'blown away,' adds 3 to Force lost for each opponent's Death Star site and, for remainder of game, your Force drains at battleground systems where you have a starfighter present with a pilot character aboard are each +2.

back.title: Massassi Base Operations / One In A Million
back.gametext: Massassi Base Operations:Deploy Yavin 4 system and Yavin 4: Docking Bay.For remainder of game, you may not play Revolution or Force drain at Yavin 4 sites or sectors.{While} this side up, you generate no more than 1 Force from each Yavin 4 site. Once during each of your deploy phases, may deploy one Yavin 4 site from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Each Imperial is deploy +2 to Yavin 4.{Flip} this card if you control three Yavin 4 sites and opponent controls fewer than three Yavin 4 sites.{Place} out of play if Yavin 4 is 'blown away.'One In A Million:{While} this side up, may deploy Death Star system without completing Death Star Plans. Once during each of your deploy phases, may take one Rebel Tech, Death Star system, Attack Run or Proton Torpedoes into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Your total power is +3 in battles at systems. If Death Star is 'blown away,' adds 3 to Force lost for each opponent's Death Star site and, for remainder of game, your Force drains at battleground systems where you have a starfighter present with a pilot character aboard are each +2.

front.title: •Massassi Base Sentry
front.gametext: Deploy on Yavin 4; it is 'liberated.'  During battle at sites related to other 'liberated' systems, may add 2 to power of each Rebel warrior (to a maximum of 4).  Once per turn, while you control this system, may retrieve 1 Force when you Force drain at another 'liberated' system.
front.lore: Rebel sentries are stationed on raised sensor platforms. On watch for Imperial scouts and other hazards, they supplement data gathered by Yavin Base's main sensors.

front.title: •Master Kenobi
front.gametext: While 'communing': you may not deploy [Maintenance] cards or [Episode I] Jedi; Rebels of ability < 5 draw one battle destiny if unable to otherwise and, once per turn, may lose 1 Force (or use 2 Force) to place one just forfeited in Used Pile; once per turn, may deploy from Reserve Deck a Tatooine battleground (or Obi-Wan's Hut); reshuffle.
front.lore: A user of the Force can alter the environment to affect the minds of others. 'The Force can have a strong influence on the weak-minded.'

front.title: •Master Luke
front.gametext: Deploys -2 on Tatooine. Power -2 when present with Vader. Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. When in battle, may target one opponent's alien present. Draw destiny. Target returns to opponent's hand if destiny > ability. Immune to attrition < 4.
front.lore: Until being reunited with Yoda, Luke suspected that he had completed his training. Has a strong influence on the weak minded.

combo: Master Luke + I Must Be Allowed To Speak (V) or non-virtual

front.title: •Master Luke (V)
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. During battle, may use 2 Force to place an opponent's alien (except Jabba or a Rep) present with Luke in owner's Force Pile (opponent may use or lose 3 Force instead). Immune to attrition < 4 (< 7 if with an alien leader).
front.lore: Until being reunited with Yoda, Luke suspected that he had completed his training. Has a strong influence on the weak minded.

front.title: •Master Qui-Gon
front.gametext: Deploys -2 on Coruscant. If opponent's Dark Jedi on table, during your move phase may use 4 Force to return Qui-Gon (and all cards on him) to owner's hand. Immune to attrition and You Are Beaten.
front.lore: Jedi Master currently not on the Council. Although he serves the Council well, there have been times when he has defied their wishes to pursue a path he believes is right.

front.title: •Master Qui-Gon (AI)
front.gametext: Deploys -2 on Coruscant. If opponent's Dark Jedi on table, during your move phase may use 4 Force to return Qui-Gon (and all cards on him) to owner's hand. Immune to attrition and You Are Beaten.
front.lore: Jedi Master currently not on the Council. Although he serves the Council well, there have been times when he has defied their wishes to pursue a path he believes is right.

front.title: •Master Qui-Gon (V)
front.gametext: Deploys -1 to [Episode I] locations. If you just lost Force from an opponent's Effect, may take an [Episode I] Interrupt (except Control) into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle, or place a card from hand under Credits Will Do Fine. Immune to You Are Beaten and attrition.  May not be Disarmed.
front.lore: Jedi Master currently not on the Council. Although he serves the Council well, there have been times when he has defied their wishes to pursue a path he believes is right.

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by James Booker - Worlds 2005)"

front.title: •Master Qui-Gon (V)
front.gametext: Deploys -1 to [Episode I] locations. If you just lost Force from an opponent's Effect, may take an [Episode I] Interrupt (except Control) into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle, or place a card from hand under Credits Will Do Fine. May not be Disarmed. Immune to You Are Beaten and attrition.
front.lore: Jedi Master currently not on the Council. Although he serves the Council well, there have been times when he has defied their wishes to pursue a path he believes is right.

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by James Booker - Worlds 2005)"
combo: Master Qui-Gon + matching lightsaber + A Jedi's Resilience
Master Qui-Gon (V) + Credits Will Do Fine

front.title: •Master Qui-Gon (V) (AI)
front.gametext: Deploys -1 to [Episode I] locations. If you just lost Force from an opponent's Effect, may take an [Episode I] Interrupt (except Control) into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle, or place a card from hand under Credits Will Do Fine. Immune to Disarmed, You Are Beaten, and attrition.
front.lore: Jedi Master currently not on the Council. Although he serves the Council well, there have been times when he has defied their wishes to pursue a path he believes is right.

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by James Booker - Worlds 2005)"

front.title: •Master Qui-Gon (V) (AI)
front.gametext: Deploys -1 to [Episode I] locations. If you just lost Force from an opponent's Effect, may take an [Episode I] Interrupt (except Control) into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle, or place a card from hand under Credits Will Do Fine. May not be Disarmed. Immune to You Are Beaten and attrition.
front.lore: Jedi Master currently not on the Council. Although he serves the Council well, there have been times when he has defied their wishes to pursue a path he believes is right.

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by James Booker - Worlds 2005)"

front.title: •Max Rebo
front.gametext: Power +2 on Hoth. If at same site as another of you musicians, you may play Bith Shuffle to cancel a Force drain at an adjacent site. While at Audience Chamber, all your other musicians are deploy -1 and forfeit +3.
front.lore: Ortolan musician and gambler. Leader of The Max Rebo Band. Signed a lifetime contract to Jabba in exchange for unlimited food.

combo: Max Rebo vs. Walker Garrison - If played correctly, Max can be the centerpiece of a deck which has to play against AT-AT's a lot. With his Power bonus, he becomes a reasonably potent character, and with his Force drain cancelling game text, he can stop at least one of the massive drains pumped out by Walker Garrison.  Max Rebo + Audience Chamber in a Jess-based deck - The musician deck is ready to rock as Max's deploy bonus decreases the already low deploy cost of the musicians, and Jess's text is made more useful.

front.title: •Max Rebo (V)
front.gametext: If just lost (even from Life Force), opponent 'steals' Max into Lost Pile. While at a battleground site: you may play Bith Shuffle or Ommni Box to cancel a Force drain at a related location, they are Lost Interrupts, and once per turn may take one of them into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.lore: Ortolan musician and gambler. Leader of The Max Rebo Band. Signed a lifetime contract to Jabba in exchange for unlimited food.

front.title: •Maz Kanata
front.gametext: Adds 1 to power of anything she pilots. Opponent's total battle destiny is -1 here. During your turn, may reveal the top three cards of your Reserve Deck, take one alien into hand (if possible), and shuffle your Reserve Deck.
front.lore: Female information broker and leader.

front.title: •Maz's Castle: Antechamber
front.gametext: Light: : Once per game, may deploy an [Episode VII] alien here from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.

front.title: •Maz's Castle: Hidden Recess
front.gametext: Light: : Once per game, if you control, may retrieve a weapon or device into hand.

front.title: •Mechanical Failure
front.gametext: Deploy on an exterior site. Target an opponent's combat vehicle at a related site. Target's power and forfeit = 0. When target reaches Utinni Effect, target draws one destiny. Utinni Effect canceled if destiny > 2. Otherwise, draw again next move phase, etc.
front.lore: The massive war machines of the Empire require tremendous effort to maintain combat readiness.

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once

front.title: •Meditation
front.gametext: Deploy on your character of ability > 3 (Effect lost if that character battles this turn). On a subsequent turn, if in a battle at a site, character's total weapon destiny is +3 and character adds one battle destiny. Effect lost at the end of that battle.
front.lore: To prepare for the inevitable conflict with Jabba's minions, Luke entered a calm state of mental preparation.

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once

front.title: Medium Bulk Freighter
front.gametext: Deploys and moves like a starfighter. May add 2 pilots, 6 passengers and 1 vehicle. Permanent pilot provides ability of 1. Has ship-docking capability. Quad Laser Cannon may deploy aboard.
front.lore: Modern Corellian design. Length 100 meters. Features engine system similar to that of a Corellian corvette. Dorsal hatch reveals hangar bay.

front.title: Medium Repeating Blaster Cannon
front.gametext: Deploy on a site. May be moved by two warriors for 1 additional Force. Your warrior present may target up to two characters or two creatures at same or adjacent site using 2 Force. Draw two destiny. Target(s) hit if total destiny > total defense value.
front.lore: Merr-Sonn Mark II repeating blaster. Accepts power cells from a very wide variety of sources, a benefit for Rebels accustomed to scavenging for supplies.

front.title: Medium Transport
front.gametext: May add 1 pilot, 4 passengers and 1 vehicle. Deploys and moves like a starfighter. Has ship-docking capability. Permanent pilot aboard provides ability of 1.
front.lore: Passenger and cargo transport built by Gallofree Yards. Enormous cargo bays can be outfitted to safely accommodate large numbers of troops, munitions or supplies.

combo: Medium Transport + Cloud Car (repeatedly)
Medium Transport + R5-M2 + BoShek Power 5, Armor 3, immune to attrition < 3, immune to Tallon Roll, and a Battle Destiny draw
Medium Transport + Evacuation Control Makes the Transport hyperspeed +2, immune to attrition < 3 and it may move for free.

front.title: •Melas
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Power +2 under 'nighttime conditions.' Immune to attrition < X, where X = number of your aliens present (including himself).
front.lore: Sarkan smuggler. Smokes an Essoomian gruu pipe to heighten awareness. Exiled from his home planet of Sarka for displaying curiosity in other aliens. Misses his homeworld.

pulledBy: Soth Petikkin (when at a Jabba's Palace site you control)

front.title: •Melas (V)
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Once per turn, may 'smoke pipe' by placing a card from hand on your Used Pile; Melas is power and defense value +2, but cannot move this turn (if during your draw phase, may instead peek at the top two cards of any Reserve Deck.)
front.lore: Sarkan smuggler. Smokes an Essoomian gruu pipe to heighten awareness. Exiled from his home planet of Sarka for displaying curiosity in other aliens. Misses his homeworld.

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by Harikrishna Mehta - Berkeley V-Lite 2005)"

front.title: •Melas (V)
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots. Opponent's starships here may not 'cloak.' Smoke Screen is a Used Interrupt when targeting Melas.
front.lore: Sarkan smuggler. Smokes an Essoomian gruu pipe to heighten awareness. Exiled from his home planet of Sarka for displaying curiosity in other aliens. Misses his homeworld.

pulledBy: Soth Petikkin (when at a Jabba's Palace site you control)

front.title: •Menace Fades
front.gametext: Deploy on table. While you control any three Coruscant, Death Star and/or Death Star II locations, or any battleground site and one battleground system, all opponents Force drain bonuses everywhere are canceled. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: As the Executor crashed into the Death Star, hope surged throughout the ranks of the outmanned Rebel fleet.

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once
Your Insight Serves You Well & Staging Areas

front.title: Merc Sunlet
front.gametext: Deploy on your non-thief to give that character thief skill. Once during each of your control phases, may target one device at same site. Draw destiny. If destiny < target's destiny number, it is stolen. OR Deploy on a weapon to prevent theft. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: A crafty purloiner from Tirac Munda with a heart of gold. Often hired to advise the wealthy on how to protect their own property. Well traveled and skilled in many languages.

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once

front.title: ••Mercenary Armor
front.gametext: Use 2 Force (free on Leia) to deploy on a Rebel without armor. Character gains {spy} skill, power +3, armor = 4, and immunity to attrition < 3. Imperial Barrier is canceled. Blasters deploy for free and fire for free on this character.
front.lore: Worn by hired guns throughout the galaxy. Often used by Rebels when infiltrating underworld organizations. Leia wore Boushh's armor when she infiltrated Black Sun.

front.title: ••Mercenary Armor (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on your alien without armor or a Rebel. This character is a spy, has armor = 4, and its immunity to attrition is +2. While opponent has a Black Sun agent, gangster, smuggler, spy, or thief on table, your destiny draws are +1. Once per turn, may take Undercover into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.lore: Worn by hired guns throughout the galaxy. Often used by Rebels when infiltrating underworld organizations. Leia wore Boushh's armor when she infiltrated Black Sun.

front.title: •Might Of The Republic
front.gametext: Once per game, retrieve 1 Force for each of your senators at Galactic Senate. (Immune to Sense.) OR Take one senator (or Coruscant Guard, Sei Taria or Mas Amedda) into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.lore: Despite its current reputation, the Republic still has able citizens that are willing to try and fight the injustices before them.

front.title: •Millennium Falcon
front.gametext: May add 2 pilots and 2 passengers. Immune to attrition < 5 if Han, Chewie or Lando piloting. Has ship-docking capability. Must have pilot aboard to use power, maneuver or hyperspeed.
front.lore: Modified YT-1300 freighter. Owned by Lando Calrissian until won by Han in a sabacc game. 26.7 meters long. 'She may not look like much, but she's got it where it counts.'

pulledBy: All Wings Report In & Darklighter Spin
combo: Millennium Falcon + Captain Han Solo + R2-D2 (Artoo-Detoo) (V) Millennium Falcon is power 9, Maneuver 9 and Hyperspeed 9 and immune to attrition < 5. All Wings Report In & Darklighter Spin on that Falcon means a battle destiny of 9.
Millennium Falcon + Captain Han Solo + Moving To Attack Position

front.title: •Millennium Falcon (V)
front.gametext: May add 2 pilots. Chewie deploys -3 aboard. If Falcon is about to use hyperspeed, draw destiny; if destiny < 3, hyperspeed = 0 this turn. Immune to attrition < 4 if Han or Chewie piloting (< 9 if both).
front.lore: Modified YT-1300 freighter. Owned by Lando Calrissian until won by Han in a sabacc game. 26.7 meters long. 'She may not look like much, but she's got it where it counts.'

front.title: Mind What You Have Learned / Save You It Can
front.gametext: Mind What You Have Learned:Deploy Dagobah system (may not be converted).{While} this side up, during your deploy phase, may deploy Luke, Yoda (deploy -2), Yoda's Hope, At Peace and/or Luke's Backpack to Dagobah from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Whenever you draw training destiny, draw two and choose one. Place Luke's completed Jedi Tests on table. Your cards at Dagobah may not Force drain or contribute to Force retrieval. Add 4 to each player's destiny draw for Sense and Alter.{Flip} this card when Luke completes Jedi Test #5.Save You It Can:{Immediately} retrieve 10 Force and place destiny card from Jedi Test #5 on that Jedi Test.{While} this side up, during your move phase, may use 3 Force to take Luke into hand from a location you control (cards on Luke go to owner's Used Pile). Luke's Jedi Test are suspended (not lost) whenever Luke not on table. Luke may ignore location deployment restrictions. Opponent may not play Sense or Alter.{Place} out of play if you Force drain at Dagobah or if Luke is placed out of play. Cancel Luke's Jedi Tests.

back.title: Mind What You Have Learned / Save You It Can
back.gametext: Mind What You Have Learned:Deploy Dagobah system (may not be converted).{While} this side up, during your deploy phase, may deploy Luke, Yoda (deploy -2), Yoda's Hope, At Peace and/or Luke's Backpack to Dagobah from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. Whenever you draw training destiny, draw two and choose one. Place Luke's completed Jedi Tests on table. Your cards at Dagobah may not Force drain or contribute to Force retrieval. Add 4 to each player's destiny draw for Sense and Alter.{Flip} this card when Luke completes Jedi Test #5.Save You It Can:{Immediately} retrieve 10 Force and place destiny card from Jedi Test #5 on that Jedi Test.{While} this side up, during your move phase, may use 3 Force to take Luke into hand from a location you control (cards on Luke go to owner's Used Pile). Luke's Jedi Test are suspended (not lost) whenever Luke not on table. Luke may ignore location deployment restrictions. Opponent may not play Sense or Alter.{Place} out of play if you Force drain at Dagobah or if Luke is placed out of play. Cancel Luke's Jedi Tests.

front.title: Mind What You Have Learned / Save You It Can (V)
front.gametext: Mind What You Have Learned:Deploy Dagobah system (may not be converted) and Strong Is Vader.{For} remainder of game, only Luke may be an apprentice. Yoda and Luke deploy -3 to Dagobah.{While} this side up, may deploy At Peace, Luke, Luke's Backpack, [Dagobah] Yoda, and/or Yoda's Hope to Dagobah from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.  Your cards on Dagobah may not contribute to Force retrieval (except with Strong Is Vader).  Each player's Sense and Alter destiny draws are +4.{Flip} this card when Luke completes Jedi Test #5.Save You It Can:{Immediately} place destiny card from Jedi Test #5 on that Jedi Test.{While} this side up, during your move phase, may use 3 Force to take Luke into hand from a location you control (cards on Luke go to owner's Used Pile).  Luke may ignore location deployment restrictions listed in his game text.  Opponent may not play Sense or Alter.{Place} out of play if Luke is placed out of play or crosses over.

back.title: Mind What You Have Learned / Save You It Can (V)
back.gametext: Mind What You Have Learned:Deploy Dagobah system (may not be converted) and Strong Is Vader.{For} remainder of game, only Luke may be an apprentice. Yoda and Luke deploy -3 to Dagobah.{While} this side up, may deploy At Peace, Luke, Luke's Backpack, [Dagobah] Yoda, and/or Yoda's Hope to Dagobah from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.  Your cards on Dagobah may not contribute to Force retrieval (except with Strong Is Vader).  Each player's Sense and Alter destiny draws are +4.{Flip} this card when Luke completes Jedi Test #5.Save You It Can:{Immediately} place destiny card from Jedi Test #5 on that Jedi Test.{While} this side up, during your move phase, may use 3 Force to take Luke into hand from a location you control (cards on Luke go to owner's Used Pile).  Luke may ignore location deployment restrictions listed in his game text.  Opponent may not play Sense or Alter.{Place} out of play if Luke is placed out of play or crosses over.

front.title: •Mindful Of The Future
front.gametext: USED: Use 2 Force to deploy a unique (•) battleground not on table, from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.  STARTING: Deploy from your Reserve Deck one Effect which deploys on table (or your side of table) and has no deploy cost; reshuffle. Place Interrupt in Lost Pile."
front.lore: 'But not at the expense of the moment.'

pulls: A unique battleground not on table
One Effect which deploys on table and has no deploy cost
Death Star: Level 6 Core Shaft Corridor

front.title: •Mindful Of The Future (V)
front.gametext: USED: If Maul just swung a lightsaber during battle, that lightsaber may not target again this battle.
front.lore: 'But not at the expense of the moment.'

front.title: •Mirax Terrik
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of anything she pilots. When piloting Pulsar Skate, draws one battle destiny if not able to otherwise. Once per turn, may use 1 Force to place a card from hand on bottom of Used Pile and draw top card of Reserve Deck.
front.lore: Called 'Myra' by childhood friend Wedge Antilles. Corellian smuggler. Captain of the Pulsar Skate. Responsible for starship repairs and upgrades. Information Broker.

pulledBy: Soth Petikkin (when at a Jabba's Palace site you control)
combo: Mirax Terrik + Pulsar Skate + Moving To Attack Position

front.title: Moisture Farmer
front.gametext: Deploy -1 to a farm or exterior Tatooine site. Power and forfeit +1 when Ardon Crell at Audience Chamber. Once during each of your control phases, may take one Hydroponics Station or Vaporator into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.
front.lore: Many native Tatooine citizens shun larger settlements. Form small communities in the desert. Their vaporators harvest water from the atmosphere.

pulls: Nar Shaddaa Wind Chimes & Out Of Somewhere

front.title: •Momaw Nadon
front.gametext: During your control phase, may snare (steal) one Bantha, Dewback, Wampa, Rancor, Bubo, or Dragonsnake present at same site.
front.lore: Male Ithorian, from a tree-loving race derogatorily nicknamed, 'Hammerheads.' Master of animal husbandry and horticulture. Former herd ship leader. Rebel spy.

pulledBy: Soth Petikkin (when at a Jabba's Palace site you control)
combo: Momaw Nadon + Double Agent

front.title: •Mon Calamari
front.gametext: Light: : If you occupy with a Star Cruiser, opponent's Star Destroyers may not deploy here. Your Star Cruisers deploy -1 here.

front.title: ••Mon Calamari Admiral
front.gametext: Adds 2 to power of any capital starship he pilots. Your Rebel starships may move to here for free. While piloting a Rebel capital starship, opponent may not modify or cancel your battle destinies here.
front.lore: Leader.

front.title: •Mon Calamari Dockyards
front.gametext: Deploy on table. Star Cruisers (except Profundity) may deploy -2 (to a maximum of -3), ignore deployment restrictions in their game text, draw one battle destiny if not able to otherwise, and are immune to attrition < 4. [Immune to Alter.]
front.lore: Admiral Ackbar's hit-and-fade tactics force the Imperial Navy to spread throughout the galaxy in a futile attempt to engage the Rebels.

front.title: •Mon Calamari Dockyards
front.gametext: Deploy on table. Star Cruisers (except Home One) may deploy -2 (to a maximum of -3), ignore deployment restrictions in their game text, draw one battle destiny if not able to otherwise, and are immune to attrition < 4. Capital Support is canceled. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Admiral Ackbar's hit-and-fade tactics force the Imperial Navy to spread throughout the galaxy in a futile attempt to engage the Rebels.

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once

front.title: Mon Calamari Star Cruiser
front.gametext: Deploys only at Mon Calamari or any Rebel Base. May add 5 pilots, 6 passengers, 1 vehicle and 3 starfighters. Has ship-docking capability. Permanent pilot aboard provides ability of 2.
front.lore: Mon Cal MC80 cruiser. Originally a civilian ship. Converted to military use following the liberation of Mon Calamari from the Empire.

combo: Mon Calamari Star Cruiser + Staging Areas

front.title: Mon Calamari Star Cruiser (V)
front.gametext: For each Imperial starship on table, deploys -1 (to a minimum of 3). May add 5 pilots, 6 passengers, 1 vehicle, and 3 starfighters. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2.
front.lore: Mon Cal MC80 cruiser. Originally a civilian ship. Converted to military use following the liberation of Mon Calamari from the Empire.

front.title: •Mon Mothma
front.gametext: While at your war room, subtracts 1 from each opponent's battle destiny at all system locations and adds 2 to forfeit of all non-unique rebels. During your deploy phase, may deploy one non-unique Rebel from Reserve Deck and reshuffle.
front.lore: Native of Chandrila. Leader of the Alliance. A former member of the Imperial Senate where she was a formidable opponent of then-Senator Palpatine. Friend of Bail Organa.

combo: Mon Mothma + Chandrila Mon Mothma deploys -2 at any Chandrila location.

front.title: Mos Eisley Blaster
front.gametext: Use 1 Force to deploy on your alien warrior (free if on Tatooine). May target a character for free. Draw destiny. Target is forfeit -2 for remainder of turn if destiny +2 > defense value.
front.lore: Easily obtained by the Rebellion. Many are copies of the BlasTech DL-18 design. Plentiful on Tatooine. Used for suppressive fire.

combo: Mos Eisley Blaster + A Gift Use these two cards together to gain a big advantage in the attrition race. The Dark Side loses two off of its destiny draws, reducing the attrition that you take. Add in the Mos Eisley Blaster, and your opponent takes the same amount of attrition, but that attrition tends to go a little bit farther, by reducing a key character (such as Ortugg or J'Quille) to attrition fodder.

front.title: •Motivator
front.gametext: Deploy on your non-[Reflections 2] astromech droid. That droid is power +2, gains [Presence Droid] and if present at a site, draws one battle destiny if unable to otherwise. During any move phase, may place this device in Lost Pile to take into hand from reserve deck one What're You Tryin' To Push On Us? or one R2-D2; reshuffle.

front.title: Motti Seeker
front.gametext: Deploys for 1 Force to an unoccupied site. Deploys and moves like an undercover spy. When present with Motti (or pilot) of ability < 3, choose one to be immediately lost (treat as an 'all cards' situation). Seeker also lost.
front.lore: Military version of a 'remote.' Programmed to stalk specific targets or secondary targets. Heat and light sensors track with fatal accuracy. Can stow away on starships.

combo: Motti Seeker + Attark

front.title: Move Along...
front.gametext: If a battle was just initiated at a site where your Jedi is present, use 1 force to draw destiny; that number of opponent's characters with ability = 1 (your choice) must each move away (for free), or be lost.
front.lore: Obi-Wan used Jedi 'affect mind' power to convince stormtroopers, 'These aren't the droids you're looking for.'

front.title: •Moving To Attack Position
front.gametext: Target one starfighter participating in a battle at a system or sector. For remainder of turn, starfighter may not move, is immune to attrition and, if piloted by any Corellian, is power +2.
front.lore: Sometimes the best defense is an insane offense.

front.title: Much to Learn, You Still Have
front.gametext: Deploy on any location. While on a battleground, adds one [Light Side Force] icon and one [Dark Side Force] icon. While on opponents non-battleground planet location (except a Kashyyyk location or docking bay), their gametext here is canceled and your Force Generation is +1. [Clone Army Icon] troopers are power + 1.
front.lore: Yoda calls upon the Force often to try and foresee what destiny has in store.

front.title: •Murr Danod
front.gametext: Your weapons and devices deploy -1 to same site. While with your unique (*) smuggler at an exterior site, opponent's total battle destiny here is -1 for each [Light Side] at same site.
front.lore: A peaceful Ithorian, Murr is a member of a Trade Guild based on an Ithorian herd ship. He treats his customers honestly, but does like to deal in 'grey' items. Smuggler.

pulledBy: Soth Petikkin (when at a Jabba's Palace site you control)

front.title: •Muunilinst
front.gametext: Light: : If you control, attrition against opponent in battles on Muunilinst is +1.

front.title: •Muunilinst: City of Harnaidan
front.gametext: Light: : Your combat vehicles here are power +1 and add 1 to each of their weapon destiny draws.

front.title: •Muunilinst: Docking Bay
front.gametext: Light: : Your docking bay transit from here requires 1 Force (free if a [Clone Army] card here).

front.title: •Muunilinst: Harnaidan Plains
front.gametext: Light: : -

front.title: •Muunilinst: Republic Landing Site
front.gametext: Light: : Your [Clone Army] characters and [Clone Army] combat vehicles may shuttle to and from this site for free.

front.title: •My Loyal Bodyguard
front.gametext: Deploy a handmaiden to Amidala's location from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. OR If opponent just initiated battle at same site as your handmaiden and Amidala, add one battle destiny.
front.lore: Amidala's handmaidens served more functions than a casual observer would ever notice.

front.title: Mynock
front.gametext: Habitat: unlimited. Parasite: Starfighter. Host's power and hyperspeed are cumulatively -2; while both < 1, Mynocks randomly detach one at a time (cannot attach for remainder of turn). Moves like a starfighter.
front.lore: Starship parasite. Flourishes in vacuum of space. Consumes radiation and other forms of energy. Chews on power cables. Adults have one-meter wingspan. Reproduces by macromiosis.

front.title: •Naboo
front.gametext: Light: : If you control, for each of your starships here, your total power is +1 in battles at Naboo sites.

front.title: Naboo Blaster Rifle
front.gametext: Use 1 Force to deploy on your warrior. May target a character, creature, vehicle using 1 Force. Draw destiny. Target hit if destiny +2 > defense value.
front.lore: Standard issue blaster given to Naboo security volunteers. Noted for its effectiveness in battle and cheap manufacturing cost.

front.title: •Naboo Celebration
front.gametext: Deploy on table. If Amidala at a Theed Palace site (or Boss Nass at an exterior Naboo site), opponent's cards with ability deploy +2 there. Once during battle at a Naboo site, if you just drew a Gungan or Royal Naboo Security for battle destiny, opponent loses 1 Force.
front.lore: The heroic actions of Amidala's forces and Boss Nass' army saved Naboo from the Trade Federation. Definitely a cause for celebration!

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once

front.title: Naboo Defense Fighter
front.gametext: Permanent pilot provides ability of 1. May add 1 pilot (suspends permanent pilot). Power +1 at Naboo system. While with another N-1 starfighter, draws one battle destiny if unable to otherwise.
front.lore: Part of the Royal Naboo Air Security Forces. Designed by Theed Palace Space Vessel Engineering Corps and used in the attack on the Trade Federation Droid Control Ship.

front.title: Naboo Fighter Pilot
front.gametext: Deploys -2 at Naboo. If just deployed aboard a N-1 starfighter, you may activate 1 Force. Adds 2 to the power of any starfighter he pilots (or 3 if piloting a N-1 starfighter). Forfeit + 1 when forfeited during a battle at a system.
front.lore: One of many pilots who assisted at the Battle of Naboo. Determined to fight for the planet he's lived on all his life.

front.title: Naboo Security Officer Blaster
front.gametext: Use 1 Force to deploy on your warrior. May target a character, creature, vehicle for free. Draw destiny. Add 1 if fired by a leader. Target hit if total destiny > defense value.
front.lore: Used primarily by high-ranking Naboo security officers, and known for its precision targeting.

front.title: •Naboo: Battle Plains
front.gametext: Light: : Once per game may take Gungan Energy Shield into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.

front.title: •Naboo: Boss Nass' Chambers
front.gametext: Light: : Once per game may take Boss Nass into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.

front.title: •Naboo: Otoh Gunga Entrance
front.gametext: Light: : Your Gungans deploy -1 here and move from here for free. You may not Force drain here.

front.title: •Naboo: Swamp
front.gametext: Light: : Your gungans are each power +1 and deploy -1 here.

front.title: •Naboo: Theed Palace Courtyard
front.gametext: Light: : Add 1 to each of your weapon destiny draws here.

front.title: •Naboo: Theed Palace Docking Bay
front.gametext: Light: : Your docking bay transit from here requires 1 Force.

front.title: •Naboo: Theed Palace Generator
front.gametext: Light: : Your Jedi are power +2 here.

front.title: •Naboo: Theed Palace Generator Core
front.gametext: Light: : Any characters of ability < 5 'hit' here (and all cards on them) are placed in owner's Used Pile.

front.title: •Naboo: Theed Palace Hallway
front.gametext: Light: : Once per game may take Ascension Guns into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.

front.title: •Naboo: Theed Palace Hallway (V)
front.gametext: Light: : Once per game, may take [Set 1] Ascension Guns into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. You move to here using landspeed for free.

front.title: •Naboo: Theed Palace Throne Room
front.gametext: Light: : While you occupy, opponent's [Presence] droids require +1 Force to move to here.

front.title: Nabrun Leids
front.gametext: At any time (except during battle), target any or all of your characters at one site to 'transport' (relocate) to any one other site. Draw destiny. Use that much Force to 'transport,' or place Interrupt in Lost Pile.
front.lore: Four-armed smuggler and pilot for hire. A Morseerian male. Breathes methane. Former fighter pilot. He can take you anywhere for the right price.

canceledBy: Ghhhk & Those Rebels Won't Escape Us
Solo? captures all Rebels transported by Nabrun Leids

front.title: •Nalan Cheel
front.gametext: After using Bith Shuffle, peek at top X cards of pile or deck just shuffled, where X = number of other musicians at same site. May reshuffle without peeking.
front.lore: Male Bith musician. Though he enjoys playing his Bandfill in Figrin D'an's band, he misses the bubblink pink swamps of his homeworld, Clak'dor VII.

front.title: •Nar Shaddaa
front.gametext: Light: : Force drain +1 here. If you control, once per game, may take Han's Toolkit into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.

front.title: •Nar Shaddaa
front.gametext: Light: : Force drain +1 here. Once per game, if your control, may take Han's Toolkit into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle.

cards.conceptBy: (Original concept by Jarad Konsker, New Jersey Mini Open 2011)"

front.title: •Nar Shaddaa Wind Chimes
front.gametext: Once per game, target one non-unique character on table. Draw destiny. If destiny is less than X, retrieve X Force, where X equals the number of copies of that card you have on table (immune to Sense). OR search your Reserve Deck and take one non-unique alien into hand; reshuffle.
front.lore: One of the few possessions Jabba brought with him from Nar Shaddaa, the smugglers moon orbiting Nal Hutta. A symbol of renewal in Hutt Society.

front.title: •Nar Shaddaa Wind Chimes & •Out Of Somewhere
front.gametext: Once per game, target one non-unique character on table. Draw destiny. If destiny < X, retrieve X Force, where X equals the number of copies of that card you have on table (Immune to Sense). OR Take one non-unique alien into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. OR If opponent just initiated a battle with more than double your total power, search your Reserve Deck. Any one character you find there may immediately deploy as a 'react;' reshuffle.

front.title: •Nar Shaddaa: Scoundrel's Rest
front.gametext: Light: : Characters (except scoundrels and bounty hunters) are deploy +1 to Nar Shaddaa.

front.title: •Nar Shaddaa: Undercity
front.gametext: Light: : Scoundrel's Guild is immune to No Escape and your force generation there is +1.

front.title: •Nar Shaddaa: Undercity Street
front.gametext: Light: : Scoundrels may move to or from here using landspeed for free.

front.title: Narrow Escape
front.gametext: If opponent just initiated battle at a site where you have a Rebel of ability > 2 present, move all of your cards with ability there away (using their landspeed).
front.lore: Blast doors seal off compartments during battles, hull ruptures or as security measures. Thick doors repel blaster rifle shots.

combo: Narrow Escape + All My Urchins A good way to make your opponent lose 2 Force for nothing. (l000needles)

front.title: •Neb Dulo
front.gametext: Power +3 when present with your musician. When a battle was just initiated where present, may choose one opponent's character of ability < X to move away for free (or that character is lost), where X = number of your musicians present.
front.lore: Disciple of Davrilat, a complicated religion based on the sanctity of harmonics. Originally from the desert planet Tocoya. Strong protective instincts.

front.title: •Neb Dulo (V)
front.gametext: Your aliens here are defense value +2. During battle with your Rep, the Rep may not be targeted by weapons.
front.lore: Disciple of Davrilat, a complicated religion based on the sanctity of harmonics. Originally from the desert planet Tocoya. Strong protective instincts.

front.title: Nebulon-B Frigate
front.gametext: May add 4 pilots, 4 passangers, and 2 starfighters. Has ship-docking capability. Permanent pilot provides ability of 1. Turbolaser batteries and laser cannons may deploy aboard for free.
front.lore: Product of Imperial Kuat Drive Yards. Several captured by Alliance. Imperial crews promptly defected. Can be outfitted for a variety of missions requiring mid-size capital starships.

front.title: •Neck And Neck
front.gametext: If difference between opponent's and your highest race totals < 4, lose 1 Force. Opponent draws no race destiny next control phase. OR If both players have < 10 Life Force remaining, both players retrieve 4 Force.
front.lore: When Anakin had finally caught up with Sebulba, he knew he needed to make some kind of a move to break away from the Dug and win the race.

front.title: •Never Tell Me The Odds
front.gametext: Insert in opponent's Reserve Deck. When Effect reaches top it is lost and up to the three lowest destiny numbers of each player's characters on table are totaled. Player with lower total loses Force equal to the difference. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: 'You said you wanted to be around when I made a mistake, well, this could be it, sweetheart.'

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once
canceledBy: You Cannot Hide Forever - Defensive Shield
You Cannot Hide Forever (V) - Defensive Shield
Your Insight Serves You Well - Defensive Shield
Your Insight Serves You Well (V) - Defensive Shield

front.title: •New Leadership Is Needed
front.gametext: If you have a senate majority, activate 1 Force. OR If your opponent has a senate majority, place your character with politics at Galactic Senate in Used Pile to place an opponent's character present (your choice) in opponent's Used Pile. (Immune to Sense.)
front.lore: The political process in the Republic is one whereby even the most powerful positions are fraught with peril.

front.title: Nice Of You Guys To Drop By
front.gametext: Send one of your missing characters at same site as one of your piloted or driven vehicles to your Used Pile. OR Cancel any attempt by one character to 'hide' from a battle.
front.lore: 'Echo Base, this is Rogue 2. I've found them. Repeat. I've found them.'

cancels: Any attempt by one character to 'hide' from battle

front.title: Nice Of You Guys To Drop By (V)
front.gametext: Take Lost In The Wilderness or a Rogue speeder into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. OR If you occupy a site, find one of your missing characters there. OR Cancel Stunning Leader. OR Cancel opponent's attempt to randomly remove one or more cards from your hand (except with Monnok).
front.lore: 'Echo Base, this is Rogue 2. I've found them. Repeat. I've found them.'

front.title: •Nick Of Time
front.gametext: Deploy on your side of table. During a battle, you may place out of play from hand a copy of any unique (•) card participating in that battle to reduce attrition against you by that card's forfeit value. (Immune to Alter while you occupy a battleground.)
front.lore: Luke barely escaped being crushed by the AT-AT's massive footpad during the Battle of Hoth.

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once

front.title: •Nick Of Time (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on table. Dack Ralter and Wes Janson add 2 to power of anything either one pilots. During your control phase, may take one Attack Pattern Delta, Desperate Tactics, Lucky Shot, One More Pass, Rapid Fire, or a vehicle weapon into hand from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. May lose 2 Force to cancel Trample or Walker Barrage. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Luke barely escaped being crushed by the AT-AT's massive footpad during the Battle of Hoth.

front.title: •Nien Nunb
front.gametext: Adds 2 to the power of anything he pilots. When at a mobile sector, once per turn you may peek at the top card of your Reserve Deck; you may place that card on top of your Used Pile. When with General Calrissian may add one battle destiny.
front.lore: Brilliant navigator. Former SoroSuub employee. Turned to pirating when that corporation backed the Empire. Tall for a Sullustan.

front.title: •Nien Nunb, Sullustan Smuggler
front.gametext: Adds 2 to the power of anything he pilots. Once during your turn, may place a card from hand (except Obi-wan) of the same card type as the top card of your Lost Pile out of play to retrieve 1 Force (may be taken into hand).
front.lore: Brilliant navigator. Former SoroSuub employee. Turned to pirating when that corporation backed the Empire. Tall for a Sullustan. Smuggler.

front.title: Nightfall
front.gametext: Deploy on any planet system to cause 'nighttime conditions' at related sites. During battles there, both sides add one destiny to power only. Spies deploy free to sites under 'nighttime conditions.'
front.lore: Tatoo I and Tatoo II, twin suns of Tatooine, create a harsh desert environment, but provide spectacular sunsets. At night, many dangers emerge from the shadows.

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once

front.title: Nightfall (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on table. Once per game, may target a system. At related sites, 'nighttime conditions' are in effect and spies are deploy -2. (Immune to Alter.)
front.lore: Tatoo I and Tatoo II, twin suns of Tatooine, create a harsh desert environment, but provide spectacular sunsets. At night, many dangers emerge from the shadows.

front.title: •No Disintegrations!
front.gametext: Use 2 Force to deploy on your side of table. If a Rebel of ability > 2 is lost (not captured) during a battle involving an opponent's bounty hunter, opponent loses 3 Force. If Vader on table, one bounty hunter involved in that battle (your choice) is also lost.
front.lore: 'There will be a substantial reward for the one who finds the Millennium Falcon. You are free to use any methods necessary, but I want them alive.'

pulledBy: We Wish To Board At Once

front.title: •No Disintegrations! (V)
front.gametext: Deploy on table. During opponent's turn, may place a just forfeited Rebel of ability > 2 out of play; opponent loses 3 Force.
front.lore: 'There will be a substantial reward for the one who finds the Millennium Falcon. You are free to use any methods necessary, but I want them alive.'

front.title: No Giben Up, General Jar Jar!
front.gametext: If you just lost a Gungan from table, place him in your hand. OR If Jar Jar and Tarpals are in a battle together, add two battle destiny.
front.lore: 'Mesa think of sumting!'

front.title: •No Questions Asked
front.gametext: Force generation at sectors a player occupies is +1 for that player. Any independent starship with an alien pilot character aboard is immune to attrition < 4 (or adds 2 to immunity). During your control phase, one of your smugglers at a site related to a system occupied by your freighter or independent starship may either fire a blaster or make a regular move using personal landspeed.

front.title: •No Questions Asked (V)
front.gametext: Players generate +1 Force at systems they occupy. Starships (except Outrider) piloted by Corellians are power +1 (+2 if pilot also a smuggler or gambler, +3 if both), may not have their power modified by opponent, and are immune to attrition < 4. While you occupy Corellia system, your Force drains are +1 at related battleground sites.

front.title: Noble Sacrifice
front.gametext: If opponent just deployed a character, sacrifice (out of play) from table one of your characters with the same power (even a captured character). You may retrieve Force from Lost Pile equal to your sacrificed character's forfeit value.
front.lore: 'You can't win Darth. If you strike me down I shall become more powerful than you can possibly imagine.' Obi-Wan's sacrifice gave the Rebels time to escape.

front.title: NOOOOOOOOOOOO!
front.gametext: USED: If you just answered 'no' to a Hypo question, opponent loses 3 Force.  LOST: Cancel Why Didn't You Tell Me? or I Am Your Father. OR If Luke is about to cross to the Dark Side, he is lost instead."
front.lore: Sometimes, the truth isn't very pretty.

front.title: NOOOOOOOOOOOO! (V)
front.gametext: Cancel Broken Concentration, The Circle Is Now Complete, or a duel initiated during a battle. (Immune to Young Fool.) OR During any draw phase, place a card from hand under your Used Pile to take any one card into hand from Force Pile; reshuffle.
front.lore: Sometimes, the truth isn't very pretty.

front.title: Nudj
